job_title: Issue Product Policy Intern, Trust & Safety*
qualification: Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree, Master's Degree
description: ResponsibilitiesTikTok is the leading destination for short-form video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy.Our Trust & Safety team's commitment is to keep our online community safe. We have invested heavily in human and machine-based moderation to remove harmful content quickly and often before it reaches our general community.The Trust & Safety Policy team develops and reviews our community policies to promote a positive and safe environment for all of our Users and Content Creators to enjoy and express themselves.ResponsibilitiesAnalyze and assess content policy related data and issues around specific topicsWork with internal policy, risk, and other Trust & Safety teams to collate information on key policy trends and developmentsConduct research on key issue areas within our Community Guidelines to help inform our policy development workProduce internal reports which help drive company thinking behind content policy decision making globallyQualificationsWhat should I bring with me?Undergraduate students with strong research, writing and analytical skills.Outstanding organizational, research, and communication skills, with a strong willingness to learn;Interest to understand concepts and issues of user safety on social media, with a particular passion in any area relevant to TikTok's Community Guidelines;Ability to commit to a full time internship based in Singapore for at least 10 weeks.English proficiency is required. In addition, proficiency in another language would be an advantage as this person might be involved in projects relating to reviewing global content and may be required to read and digest information in other languages.TikTok is committed to the wellbeing of all our employees. Our promise is to provide comprehensive and evidence-based programs, to promote and support physical and mental wellbeing throughout each employee's journey with us. We believe that wellbeing is a relationship and that everyone has a part to play, so we work in collaboration and consultation with our employees and across our functions in order to ensure a truly person-centred, innovative and integrated approach.TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We believe individuals shouldn't be disadvantaged because of their background or identity, but instead should be considered based on their strengths and experience. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

qualification: Diploma, Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma, Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree
description: TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.We are now looking for talented individuals to join us for an internship in 2022 - people who want to inspire creativity and co-create the future with TikTok.Successful candidates must be able to commit to one of the following internship cycles below:Summer Internship - 09 May 2022 to 29 July 2022 (12 weeks)Off-cycle Internship - 01 August 2022 to 16 December 2022 (20 weeks)We will prioritize candidates who are able to commit to the two above internship periods.Please state your availability clearly in the comments section (Start date, End date).Candidates can apply to a maximum of two positions and will be considered for jobs in the order you apply. The application limit is firm and includes all TikTok/ByteDance jobs globally. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis and we encourage you to apply early.About the Business Risk Integrated Control (BRIC) teamThe Business Risk Integrated Control (BRIC) team is missioned to:Protect users, including and beyond content consumers, creators, advertisers;Secure platform health and community experience authenticity;Build infrastructures, platforms and technologies, as well as to collaborate with many cross-functional teams and stakeholders.The BRIC team works to minimize the damage of inauthentic behaviors on platforms, covering multiple classical and novel community and business risk areas such as account integrity, engagement authenticity, anti spam, API abuse, growth fraud, live streaming security and financial safety (ads or e-commerce), etc.In this team you'll have a unique opportunity to have first-hand exposure to the strategy of the company in key security initiatives, especially in building scalable and robust, intelligent and privacy-safe, secure and product-friendly systems and solutions. Our challenges are not some regular day-to-day technical puzzles -- You'll be part of a team that's developing novel solutions to first-seen challenges of a non-stop evolvement of a phenomenal product eco-system. The work needs to be fast, transferrable, while still down to the ground to making quick and solid differences.Responsibilities:Build rules, algorithms and machine learning models, to respond to and mitigate business risks in products/platforms. Such risks include and are not limited to abusive accounts, fake engagements, spammy redirection, scraping, fraud, etc.;Analyze business and security data, uncover evolving attack motions, identify weaknesses and opportunities in risk defense solutions, explore new space from the discoveries;Define risk control measurements, quantify, generalize and monitor risk related business and operational metrics, and align risk teams and their stakeholders on risk control numeric goals, promote impact-oriented, data-driven data science practices for risks.Qualifications:Undergraduate, or Postgraduate who is currently pursuing a degree/master in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Internet Security or a related technical discipline;Proficiency in data/statistical analytical tools, such as SQL, R and Python;Ability to think and communicate critically, rigorously and concisely;Strong sense of ownership and urgency, proactive and skillful communication, ability to handle high complexity problems and cross-functional alignment while being consistently independent, objective and rational;Experience in academia or industry leading skills in online social/content platforms, online commercial or financial businesses, state-of-art machine learning theories and applications would be advantageous.

qualification: Not Specified
description: What the role isApplicants are invited for Internship at the Regional Economic Studies (RES) Programme. The RES programme focuses on a range of economic issues in Southeast Asia. Emphasis is on timely, policy-related research that is relevant to decision-makers as well as researchers. Key research areas are: macroeconomic developments in Southeast Asia; international trade and finance; country-level studies on themes relating to socio-economic development; sub-national economic dynamics; ASEAN regionalism and its linkages with Asian neighbours. The programme publishes the tri-annual Journal of Southeast Asian Economies (JSEAE) and also hosts the Singapore APEC Study Centre, which analyses developments in the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) process.What you will be working onThe RES intern will be expected to participate in the following tasks: a. Assist in data collection, compilation and analysis b. Assist in writing notes for RES meetings and seminars c. Assist in editorial workWhat we are looking forThe intern is not required to have prior research experience. However, they will be expected to be possess good writing and presentation skills. Applicants will be notified if they are shortlisted within 4 weeks of the closing date of the job posting. (Only shortlisted candidates will be notified)-

qualification: Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree, Master's Degree
description: ResponsibilitiesTikTok is the leading destination for short-form video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy.Our Trust & Safety team's commitment is to keep our online community safe. We have invested heavily in human and machine-based moderation to remove harmful content quickly and often before it reaches our general community.The Trust & Safety Policy team develops and reviews our community policies to promote a positive and safe environment for all of our Users and Content Creators to enjoy and express themselves.ResponsibilitiesAnalyze and assess content policy related data and issues around specific topicsWork with internal policy, risk, and other Trust & Safety teams to collate information on key policy trends and developmentsConduct research on key issue areas within our Community Guidelines to help inform our policy development workProduce internal reports which help drive company thinking behind content policy decision making globallyQualificationsWhat should I bring with me?Undergraduate students with strong research, writing and analytical skills.Outstanding organizational, research, and communication skills, with a strong willingness to learn;Interest to understand concepts and issues of user safety on social media, with a particular passion in any area relevant to TikTok's Community Guidelines;Ability to commit to a full time internship based in Singapore for at least 10 weeks.English proficiency is required. In addition, proficiency in another language would be an advantage as this person might be involved in projects relating to reviewing global content and may be required to read and digest information in other languages.TikTok is committed to the wellbeing of all our employees. Our promise is to provide comprehensive and evidence-based programs, to promote and support physical and mental wellbeing throughout each employee's journey with us. We believe that wellbeing is a relationship and that everyone has a part to play, so we work in collaboration and consultation with our employees and across our functions in order to ensure a truly person-centred, innovative and integrated approach.TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We believe individuals shouldn't be disadvantaged because of their background or identity, but instead should be considered based on their strengths and experience. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

description: ResponsibilitiesFounded in 2012, ByteDance's mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. With a suite of more than a dozen products, including TikTok, Helo, and Resso, as well as platforms specific to the China market, including Toutiao, Douyin, and Xigua, ByteDance has made it easier and more fun for people to connect with, consume, and create content.We are now looking for talented individuals to join us for an internship in 2022 - people who want to inspire creativity and co-create the future with ByteDance.Successful candidates must be able to commit to one of the following internship cycles below: -Summer Internship - 09 May 2022 to 29 July 2022 (12 weeks)Off-cycle Internship - 01 August 2022 to 16 December 2022 (20 weeks)We will prioritize candidates who are able to commit to the two above internship periods.Please state your availability clearly in the comments section (Start date, End date).Candidates can apply to a maximum of two positions and will be considered for jobs in the order you apply. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis and we encourage you to apply early.About the Global Payments teamThe Global Payments team is building a platform to provide cross-border payment solutions for ByteDance's products and services, that are growing rapidly worldwide. We serve multiple overseas businesses within ByteDance, such as Advertising, Live Broadcasting, E-commerce, Games, etc.The risk control and compliance technical team in Global Payments is mainly responsible for overseas transaction anti-fraud, chargebacks, credit evaluation, merchant risk rating, anti-money laundering and other business scenarios. In addition, the team ensures the platform adheres to the requirements of International Credit Card Organization, local financial supervision, and customs.ResponsibilitiesDesign and develop the payment platform for various internal businesses and engineers such as building the dispute center and automating data pipelines;Integrate with third-party APIs to enhance system capabilities;Analyze business and technical requirements carefully to solve challenging problems in building the platform;Work with fellow engineers, product managers and business owners in the team to ensure product requirements and timelines are feasible.QualificationsEntry level candidates or Postgraduate who is currently pursuing a degree/master in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Systems or a related technical discipline;Software development experience in one or more general purpose programming languages;Excellent proficiency in backend server development and expertise in relational database;Strong analytical thinking and exceptional attention to details.By submitting an application for this role, you accept and agree to our global applicant privacy policy, which may be accessed here: https://jobs.bytedance.com/en/legal/privacy.

description: Position OverviewAutodesk's Forge team is looking for a passionate Intern Software Engineer. Our organizational ecosystem comprises of Cloud services. The Forge platform unlocks the functionality in Autodesk products that have been serving industries such as architecture, engineering, construction, manufacturing, media, and others. It is an opportunity to work on applications that directly impact the millions of users of Autodesk products.ResponsibilitiesAn active member of a highly skilled and motivated agile development teamInvolved with all aspects of software development, working to create and maintain the most reliable, secure, performant and high throughput service for our customers by leveraging cloud technologyYou should be ready to wear multiple hats. Take responsibilities of a Software Developer, Quality Assurance engineer, and DevOps engineerCollaborate with software engineers and other stakeholders. As a member of an Agile development team, you will frequently be choosing yourself which tasks to work on, rather than being assigned work by someoneContribute to software design by leveraging cloud design patterns and build the cloud expertiseContribute to improvements in the processes and deliverables that increase the effectiveness and efficiency of the team in responding to customer and business needsDocument and present your ideas and solutions accurately and thoroughlyMinimum QualificationsExcellent communication & interpersonal skills; ability to collaborate in a globally distributed environmentExceptional analytical, debugging, problem-solving and root-cause analysis skills.Knowledge of and ability to learn various development and scripting languages such as PythonKnowledge of and familiarity with at least one operating system such as Windows, Linux or Mac OSKnowledge of source code management tools like GitHub, SVN, etc.Familiarity with building in Cloud e.g. AWS, Azure, GCPFamiliarity of Continuous Integration (CI) and Continuous Delivery (CD) best practicesPreferred QualificationsExcellent communication & interpersonal skills; ability to collaborate in a globally distributed environmentExceptional analytical, debugging, problem-solving and root-cause analysis skills.Knowledge of and ability to learn various development and scripting languages such as PythonKnowledge of and familiarity with at least one operating system such as Windows, Linux or Mac OSKnowledge of source code management tools like GitHub, SVN, etc.Familiarity with building in Cloud e.g. AWS, Azure, GCPFamiliarity of Continuous Integration (CI) and Continuous Delivery (CD) best practicesLearning BenefitsExperience Agile (scrum) software development methodology through day to day workGain exposure to Cloud-based software architecture and technologies, familiarize oneself with different tools such as RESTful web services, GitHub, Jenkins, Splunk, Grafana, NewRelic, Docker etc.Acquire hands-on experience on software development, software test automation, code delivery process, continuous integrationWork with different roles and distributed teams globallyHone problem solving and communication skillsAbout AutodeskWith Autodesk software, you have the power to Make Anything. The future of making is here, bringing with it radical changes in the way things are designed, made, and used. It?€?s disrupting every industry: architecture, engineering, construction, manufacturing, and media and entertainment. With the right knowledge and tools, this disruption is your opportunity.Our software is used by everyone - from design professionals, engineers, and architects to digital artists, students, and hobbyists. We constantly explore new ways to integrate all dimensions of diversity across our employees, customers, partners, and communities. Our ultimate goal is to expand opportunities for anyone to imagine, design, and make a better world.At Autodesk, we're building a diverse workplace and an inclusive culture to give more people the chance to imagine, design, and make a better world. Autodesk is proud to be an equal opportunity employer and considers all qualified applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, age, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, national origin, disability, veteran status or any other legally protected characteristic. We also consider for employment all qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with applicable law.Are you an existing contractor or consultant with Autodesk? Please search for open jobs and apply internally (not on this external site). If you have any questions or require support, contact Autodesk Careers.

qualification: Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree
description: Job DescriptionBe a part of a dynamic and diverse team that engineers large-scale, complex and resilient technology solutions that drive our global business. You'll help build and optimize digital applications and systems that support millions of customers, clients and employees worldwide.When you work at JPMorgan Chase, you're not just working at a global financial institution. You're an integral part of one of the world's biggest tech companies. In 16 strategic technology locations worldwide, our team of more than 50,000 technologists design, build and deploy everything from enterprise technology initiatives to big data and mobile solutions, as well as innovations in electronic payments, cybersecurity, machine learning and cloud development. We partner with FinTech and Silicon Valley tech firms to deliver cutting-edge solutions to our clients and customers. Our $10.8 billion annual investment in technology enables us to hire people to create innovative solutions that will not only transform the financial services industry, but also change the world.??What You Can ExpectAs an integral part of a team, you are expected to make a personal impact right from the start of the program.The Polytechnic Industrial Attachment Program is designed to provide a realistic career experience working in the financial services and gain real work experience as part of our innovative and exciting teams across our lines of businesses. Learning & development opportunities will also be provided throughout the program duration as well as senior management networking opportunities.Begin with an induction covering our tech strategies, products and systems, as well as an overview of our technology community.Dive head-first and gain hands-on experience creating innovative solutions that make a difference for our customers, clients and employees.Work on agile teams with peers and experienced software engineers to grow your skills, share ideas and innovate with our technology community all over the world.Gain deeper insight into what it means to work here through networking events, senior speaker sessions and peer-mentorship programs.About youIf you're ready to put your passion for technology to work in a way that makes a real difference, you'll find your place in our Polytechnic Industrial Attachment Program.Key Qualifications:Foundational knowledge of programming languages (e.g., Python, Javascript, Java, C++, C#), databases, data structures, and algorithmsCurrently pursuing a diploma qualificationAll academic disciplines and majors welcomeFluency in English (verbal and written) is essentialStrong attention to detailStrong communication and interpersonal skillsComfortable working in teams to deliver resultsHighly motivated with a ?€?can-do?€? attitudeAbility to multi-task and work in a fast-paced environmentAvailable for internship from March 2022 to August 2022What You Might Be Doing?You will be part of one of??our innovative and exciting teams across our lines of businesses.Corporate & Investment Bank (CIB)Builds and maintains the technology to safely service the world's most important corporations, governments, and institutions. CIB provides strategic advice, raises capital, manages risk, and extends liquidity in markets spanning over 100 countries around the world. CIB technologists develop solutions for a bank entrusted with holding $18 trillion of assets and $393 billion in deposits.Asset & Wealth Management (AWM)Serves institutional, high net worth, and retail clients. With client assets of $2.9 trillion and assets under management of $2.1 trillion, JPMC has one of the largest asset and wealth management divisions in the world. AWM Technology creates solutions to enable the AWM business to take care of clients' wealth and help clients get properly invested. AWM Technology is comprised of 4,600 agile technologists operating in a cloud-native environment using a data-centric approach to develop innovative technology solutions.What Next?Join our world-class team by submitting your application through the careers website at jpmorgan.com/careers.Complete the online application form, attach your resume and cover letter.Once you submit your application, you will not be able to make changes to your application information.We encourage early applications as screening will be conducted on a rolling basis.Reasonable AdjustmentsJ.P. Morgan is an inclusive employer of choice. If you require any adjustments to enable you to perform the essential functions of your job, please do not hesitate to contact your recruiter.If you would prefer to discuss this confidentially, please contact your respective recruiter.??2021 JPMorgan Chase & Co. All rights reserved. JPMorgan Chase is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer Disability/Veteran.

We partner with FinTech and Silicon Valley tech firms to deliver cutting-edge solutions to our clients and customers. Our $10.8 billion annual investment in technology enables us to hire people to create innovative solutions that will not only transform the financial services industry, but also change the world.??What You Can ExpectAs an integral part of a team, you are expected to make a personal impact right from the start of the program.The Polytechnic Industrial Attachment Program is designed to provide a realistic career experience working in the financial services and gain real work experience as part of our innovative and exciting teams across our lines of businesses. Learning & development opportunities will also be provided throughout the program duration as well as senior management networking opportunities.Begin with an induction covering our tech strategies, products and systems, as well as an overview of our technology community.Dive head-first and gain hands-on experience creating innovative solutions that make a difference for our customers, clients and employees.Work on agile teams with peers and experienced software engineers to grow your skills, share ideas and innovate with our technology community all over the world.Gain deeper insight into what it means to work here through networking events, senior speaker sessions and peer-mentorship programs.About youIf you're ready to put your passion for technology to work in a way that makes a real difference, you'll find your place in our Polytechnic Industrial Attachment Program.Key Qualifications:Foundational knowledge of programming languages (e.g., Python, Javascript, Java, C++, C#), databases, data structures, and algorithmsCurrently pursuing a diploma qualificationAll academic disciplines and majors welcomeFluency in English (verbal and written) is essentialStrong attention to detailStrong communication and interpersonal skillsComfortable working in teams to deliver resultsHighly motivated with a ?€?can-do?€? attitudeAbility to multi-task and work in a fast-paced environmentAvailable for internship from March 2022 to August 2022What You Might Be Doing?You will be part of one of??our innovative and exciting teams across our lines of businesses.Corporate & Investment Bank (CIB)Builds and maintains the technology to safely service the world's most important corporations, governments, and institutions. CIB provides strategic advice, raises capital, manages risk, and extends liquidity in markets spanning over 100 countries around the world. CIB technologists develop solutions for a bank entrusted with holding $18 trillion of assets and $393 billion in deposits.Asset & Wealth Management (AWM)Serves institutional, high net worth, and retail clients. With client assets of $2.9 trillion and assets under management of $2.1 trillion, JPMC has one of the largest asset and wealth management divisions in the world. AWM Technology creates solutions to enable the AWM business to take care of clients' wealth and help clients get properly invested. AWM Technology is comprised of 4,600 agile technologists operating in a cloud-native environment using a data-centric approach to develop innovative technology solutions.What Next?Join our world-class team by submitting your application through the careers website at jpmorgan.com/careers.Complete the online application form, attach your resume and cover letter.Once you submit your application, you will not be able to make changes to your application information.We encourage early applications as screening will be conducted on a rolling basis.Reasonable AdjustmentsJ.P. Morgan is an inclusive employer of choice. If you require any adjustments to enable you to perform the essential functions of your job, please do not hesitate to contact your recruiter.If you would prefer to discuss this confidentially, please contact your respective recruiter.??2021 JPMorgan Chase & Co. We do it all while committing to integrity, sustainability, and giving back to our communities. You will re-imagine our silicon to systems development flow to accelerate the velocity of innovation in Micron?€?s products. The silicon systems AI group is a small team of technologists collaborating cross-functionally with domain experts and data scientists inside and outside of Micron. You will bring new energy and ideas to the aspirational goal of changing the world for the better with Micron?€?s products and technologies with AI enablement at the forefront.We are looking for interns with a strong background in key areas of artificial intelligence, such as machine learning, deep learning, reinforcement learning, natural language processing and understanding. The candidates are expected to have a good mathematical foundation and should be capable of analyzing and developing new AI algorithms. You are also expected to have very good programming skills to implement and run AI algorithms at scale. With a relentless focus on our customers, technology leadership, and manufacturing and operational excellence, Micron delivers a rich portfolio of high-performance DRAM, NAND, and NOR memory and storage products through our Micron?? and Crucial?? brands. The initial product was forked from Clickhouse, after which large re-architecture had been taken place. The product now not only improves the efficiency of Clickhouse but also fits into the elastic cloud-native infrastructure with better scalability and resource utilization. With years of polishment in the internal EB-level scenarios, we are now ready to serve our business partners via various cloud vendors.The Quality Assurance (QA) team is seeking a Software Test Engineer Intern to support our application testing. The ideal candidate will be with both manual and automation testing skills and able to support Agile SDLC. This is an intern position located in Singapore.What you will be doing:Be responsible for software testing and quality assurance of the productWork closely with the Product owner, Ux designer, Development, and DevOps teams, perform testing activities in an Agile development environment, and deliver high-quality applications in a collaborative mannerUnderstand and analyze requirements, prepare test data, design and execute test cases via manual and/or automation testing, and follow testing standardsReport testing progress timely, highlight risks to stakeholders and manage defectsAdopt and develop automation framework/tools, continuously improving automated test suitesFocus on functional testing, may also support non-functional testing, such as performance testing, etc.QualificationsWhat you should have:Undergraduate, or Postgraduate who is currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science, related engineering discipline, or equivalent practical experience;Basic knowledge of manual testing and automation framework (BDD / Data Driven / Selenium / TestNg / etc)Familiarity with at least one of the programming languages: Java, Python, Go, C++Knowledge of RESTful API testing is a plusBasic knowledge of OLAP engines is preferred, such as ClickHouse, Greenplum etc. - Knowledge of other DBMS is also a plusGood communication and interpersonal skills, a team playerTikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. description: ResponsibilitiesTikTok is the leading destination for short-form video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. Our Trust & Safety team's commitment is to keep our online community safe. We have invested heavily in human and machine-based moderation to remove harmful content quickly and often before it reaches our general community.The Enablement team aims to be the strategic partner of T&S, driving collaboration, optimization, and synergy for T&S global functioning, whereas other T&S functions fight at the frontline for content integrity and community safety. We facilitate the application of smooth cross-functional/cross-region/cross-culture corporations, support, and training, and drive change initiatives for leadership within the organization so that they fight with maximum efficiency and sustainability.The L&D team serves business development through skill-set building from a talent development perspective; helps and accompanies employees' individual development during different stages of their career;We?€?re looking for a L&D effectiveness intern to join our Learning and Development (L&D) team. This role will play a critical role in the way the L&D team demonstrates its success and helps with the reporting of our programs . The ideal candidate is a great communicator, good with data and simplifying data for audiences and using effective data storytelling to deliver key insights.Job RequirementsInterested in helping shape the strategy for assessing the effectiveness and impact of L&D on Business and Career development, using a data-driven approach;Assists with industry research on how to measure the success of an L&D function;Assists with defining the new measures of success for the global L&D function by working closely with L&D, HR and data teams;Undertakes reporting and dashboarding tasks from the L&D function and different L&D programs and creates effective reports;Assists with User Experience research and interviews to help understand the effectiveness of the learning program;Creates and strategises development of new data visualisation formats to show impact of L&D on Business performance (by leveraging data tools);Helps automate and streamline the process of reportingQualificationsIdeally a 3rd year student;Can work at least 3 days a week from August 2022 to December 2022;Preferably a degree in a field emphasizing analyzing, displaying, or reporting on people related data in organizations e.g., industrial/organizational psychology, behavioural economics, organizational behavior, economics, statistics, data analytics;English proficiency;Has a good foundational knowledge of data collection (surveys), analysis and visualisation softwares (e.g., Tableau), and Excel (e.g., VLOOKUP, pivots);Knowledge of producing good reports using tools;Analytical, proactive, responsible, and good communicator in a team setting environmentTrust & Safety is committed to the wellbeing of all our employees. Our promise is to provide comprehensive and evidence-based programs, to promote and support physical and mental wellbeing throughout each employee's journey with us. We believe that wellbeing is a relationship and that everyone has a part to play, so we work in collaboration and consultation with our employees and across our functions in order to ensure a truly person-centred, innovative and integrated approach.TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.ApplyShare to

description: About SleekSleek is on a mission to revolutionize how entrepreneurs operate their business. We want to give small business owners peace of mind and the power of online solutions to allow them to focus on what they do best - growing their business. As we work for our thousands of customers, we gather millions of data points about their business, and in turn we transform those into useful, actionable insights and recommendations to accelerate their growth through smart algorithms.We are a team of 250 builders from 17 countries, with offices in Singapore, Philippines, Hong Kong, Australia and the UK committed to delivering a delightful experience to our clients!We are looking for a CSR & Marketing Intern to help us grow our positive impact together.Position DutiesAssist with activities related to Sleek?€?s monthly sustainability operations.Gather and analyze data pertaining to CSR.Support our CSR and sustainability initiatives with PR and communication efforts.Liaise with internal and external stakeholders to work on collaborations between communities for marketing and CSR efforts.Help support the marketing efforts for Sleek Singapore (inclusive of email marketing, social media, website, content marketing, events)Assist to curate content across social media channels and community managementCreate effective, engaging graphics that support and promote content through designAssist in the curation, research and copywriting of marketing content (inclusive of blog articles, guides, e-books, infographics)Regularly assess & report on performance of digital campaigns and brainstorm new ideasPerformance StandardsHave a heart to do good and create positive impact, with the mindset of an entrepreneur and hustler? We want YOU! We are looking for a passionate, multi-faceted Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) Intern. In this exciting role, the CSR Intern will provide support and assistance to Sleek?€?s growing Corporate Responsibility program - Do Better by Sleek and Sleek Singapore?€?s wider growth marketing initiatives. Under our CSR initiative, we are focused on these three action pillars: tech for good, communities for change, and our sustainability promise. We are committed to work towards the highest standards of social, ethical, and environmental conduct and responsibility.Currently enrolled in a Bachelor?€?s or Master?€?s degree program and majoring in Sustainable Management, Environmental Sciences, Business, Data Management, Communications, or related fields.Demonstrated interest in corporate social responsibility (CSR), sustainability, social and environmental issues.Excellent written and verbal communication skills.A first internship in communication or PR agency or prior knowledge of the non-profit/social enterprise scene would be helpful.A good eye for design and user experience (UX), and proficiency in Adobe Photoshop or Illustrator is helpful as well.Proficient computer skills, including Microsoft PowerPoint, Excel, and Word.Detail oriented and organized.Ability to be resourceful, collaborate and also work independently.Exceptional time management, analytical, problem-solving, and researching skills.More about Sleek!At Sleek, we work in a fast-paced start-up environment. We have a strong culture built around our five core values: Simplicity, Loyalty, Excellence, Entrepreneurship, Kindness. As a deliberately multicultural team, our team comprises more than 18 nationalities and spoken languages.We consider the company?€?s success to be a result of committed individual and team efforts, and are looking to onboard talented and creative people who want to make a difference. Corporate social responsibility is a passion, and as an equal opportunity employer we aim at making the world a better place. With a strong commitment to also make Sleek a great place to work, we offer a flexible working environment where we empower every team member to be the best they can be - regardless of race, ethnicity, religion, gender, age or identity.If you think you would be a good fit for our mission, we look forward to hearing from you!-

description: ResponsibilitiesThe e-commerce industry has seen tremendous growth in recent years and has become a hotly contested space amongst leading Internet companies, and its future growth cannot be underestimated.With millions of loyal users globally, we believe TikTok is an ideal platform to deliver a brand new and better e-commerce experience to our users. We are looking for passionate and talented people to join our product and operations team, together we can build an e-commerce ecosystem that is innovative, secure and intuitive for our users.In this role, we are looking for interns with strong interest in the e-commerce business who will support the global e-commerce platform campaign operations and planning.Job Description:Assist in conceptualizing, developing and executing marketing campaigns, including major sales (e.g. 11.11), seasonal festivals (e.g. Chinese New Year, Christmas) and other major cross-category campaigns.Collaborate and coordinate across stakeholders, including working with internal account managers, user research, creator manager, and other cross functional teams (e.g. Marketing team, PR, graphic designers, product team, R&D team etc etc) for campaign creation and optimization.Conduct data analysis on campaigns performance (including against order and GMV targets) and offer ongoing recommendations for campaign optimization, such as innovative ideas, partnerships and activations that enhance campaigns performance.Keep abreast of trends on social media, e-Commerce, digital marketing and industry developments, and leverage trends and developments to optimise campaigns.QualificationsCurrently studying in a recognized polytechnic/university, preferably in a communications/marketing/eCommerce-related majorFull time intern who can work more than 4 months is a plus (5 days a week)Excellent stakeholder and project management skills. Strong ability to manage expectations, drive for performance and collaborate with internal stakeholders under tight timelines and pressure.Independent and self-motivated, with good end-to-end ownership of projects. Open to taking on new and ambiguous projects.Able to multi-task and prioritise under pressure.An analytical and structured thinker, strong with understanding and deriving insights from data.Strong communication and writing skills. Good command of English.Prior internships in marketing, e-commerce platforms, creative agencies will be a bonus.

description: Luxury Audio-Tech Company in FranceFriendly & open environment, young & cheerful teamExcellent APAC exposure, Hybrid Work ArrangementJob DescriptionFounded in 2007 and headquartered in Paris, Devialet is celebrated for its innovation in acoustics, industrial design and sound technologies. Our story began with ADH??, a revolutionary patented invention that would forever change high-end amplifiers. A mind-blowing feat, this hybrid technology seamlessly blends digital and analog to produce sound quality unlike anything previously experienced.Every day, all our teams work tirelessly towards one goal: delivering emotion, exposing the purest sound to as many people as possible, with no distortion, saturation or background noise. Step by step, we have sparked a real technological revolution in the audio world that got in motion thanks to some radical innovations. Since our creation, we have registered over 100+ patents.From Hong Kong and New York to London and Munich, we?€?re constantly looking for talented women and men who want to support our projects and values.Ready to join us?Marketing Intern, APAC (6-month internship)This internship is a regional marketing role whereby you will be mentored directly by the Marketing & Communications Senior Manager, APAC. You will assist with various marketing activities, such as:Support the team in developing and implementing marketing and communications initiatives, including but not limited to in-store activations, in-mall marketing, seeding and press & VIP events;Liaise with third-party vendors for trade marketing & PR related activities;Manage the inventory in/out for PR samples;??Responsible for proofreading translated marketing collateral;??Work with the APAC marketing team on partners?€? asset requests;Prepare and consolidate monthly marketing & PR reports;Conduct research on market trends;Support on daily administrative tasks.RequirementsGood command of spoken and written English and Mandarin;??With a can-do attitude;Strong organizational skills;Creative and sensitive to brand positioning;Proactive, able to work independently in a fast-paced environment;Enjoy working in a start-up structure;Team player attitude;Proactive in proposing improvements/suggestions;Excellent communicator and creative thinker;Commercial awareness;Music Lover;A commitment of 6-months is a must.

qualification: Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree, Master's Degree
description: ResponsibilitiesTikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.We are looking for talented individuals to join us! As an intern Engineer, you'll have the chance to work with our clients and teams to address key business problems and identify areas of growth for the company. You'll drive the development of the systems behind TikTok and work with other team members to inspire creativity and bring joy to users around the globe from day one.About TikTok Engineering teamYou'll have a unique opportunity to have first-hand exposure to building innovative, scalable and secure systems and solutions. You will play a key role in ensuring TikTok continues healthy growth and delivers the best product experience to all of our users to help them enjoy their time on TikTok.Potential TeamsIf you're looking for challenging ground to push your limits, here are some potential teams to kickstart your careerGlobal LivestreamingOur team focuses on delivering engaging and the best live streaming experience to global users. We develop creative and interesting features for streamers and viewers to express themselves and interact with others instantly.SocialTikTok Social team's mission is to facilitate meaningful user connections through TikTok's messaging experience. Our team drives significant user engagement and retention wins through fun, innovative, and technically sophisticated products and features. Some core features and components we build and maintain include User Profile, Story, Inbox, Messaging, Follow, Like, Comment, Tag, etc.Privacy & SecurityOur team aims to build a trusted platform by promoting privacy by design - we design architectures that treat user data respectfully, with transparency, and in line with reasonable practices. We build novel solutions to first-seen challenges of a non-stop evolution of a phenomenal product eco-system.Frontend + Web ArchitectureOur team builds and maintains the web products and infrastructure for TikTok, including www.tiktok.com, hybrid pages in the mobile app, and TikTok TV. Our goal is to build stable, sustainable, and reusable infrastructure, so that each product team can develop, test, and deploy their features more efficiently and effectively.TestingOur goal is to facilitate the successful release of TikTok features and enhancements from development to production through effective testing delivering continuous quality at speed. We own the entire system testing process, including but not limited to: analysis, design, executing test plans and cases, and conducting defect tracking.Stability and Quality teamThe Stability and Quality team is responsible for ensuring that the services provided by TikTok are highly reliable with low-latency. The team focuses on building and integrating software tools as solutions to improve system reliability, automation and scalability. The solutions include on-call monitoring, automated capacity planning, fault-tolerant business architecture and plans for intelligent failure recovery.QualificationsUndergraduate, or Postgraduate with a background in Software Development, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a related technical disciplineProficiency in coding & scripting languages such as C/C++, Java, Kotlin, Objective-C, Swift, JavaScript or PythonSolid understanding of computer science and strong problem solving skillsGood team communication and collaboration skillsPrior experience in mobile development (Android/iOS apps) is a plusBy submitting an application for this role, you accept and agree to our global applicant privacy policy, which may be accessed here: https://careers.tiktok.com/legal/privacy.Assessment process will primarily commence from Mid-August 2022.

job_title: VISA Technology Semester Internship (Jan 23 - May / June 23)
qualification: Not Specified
description: Company DescriptionAs the world's leader in digital payments technology, Visa's mission is to connect the world through the most creative, reliable and secure payment network - enabling individuals, businesses, and economies to thrive. Our advanced global processing network, VisaNet, provides secure and reliable payments around the world, and is capable of handling more than 65,000 transaction messages a second. The company's dedication to innovation drives the rapid growth of connected commerce on any device, and fuels the dream of a cashless future for everyone, everywhere. As the world moves from analog to digital, Visa is applying our brand, products, people, network and scale to reshape the future of commerce.At Visa, your individuality fits right in. Working here gives you an opportunity to impact the world, invest in your career growth, and be part of an inclusive and diverse workplace. We are a global team of disruptors, trailblazers, innovators and risk-takers who are helping drive economic growth in even the most remote parts of the world, creatively moving the industry forward, and doing meaningful work that brings financial literacy and digital commerce to millions of unbanked and underserved consumers.You're an Individual. We're the team for you. Together, let's transform the way the world pays.Job DescriptionApplication Closing Date: Monday, 19th September 2022Due to COVID-19 travel and entry restrictions, the Internship Program is only available to candidates with the right to work in Singapore. We will review and adjust this approach as appropriate for future programs.The Visa Internship Program is the biggest step you can take to joining our Revolution of Payments Innovation. You will take on meaningful work, get executive exposure, engage in out-of-the-box problem solving, and participate in social and community service activities. From technology to business, we are looking for people who can innovate, collaborate and drive Visa into the next era of an already rapidly-evolving digital market place. If you?€?re up for the challenge, please consider joining our team.We are looking for Engineers across the Technology Organization. Some of the roles in Visa Technology team includes:Software EngineeringSoftware Test EngineeringSystems Engineering / AnalystDevOpsThe different Visa Technology teams you will have the opportunity to be part of are the following:- Payment Products:??Develops and manages end-to-end technology solutions that deliver reliable, scalable and secure financial transaction processing services to Visa job_title: Risk Analysis Intern - Trust & Safety - Thai/Tagalog Speaking*
qualification: Professional Certificate/NiTEC, Diploma, Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma, Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree
description: ResponsibilitiesTikTok is the leading destination for short-form video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy.Our Trust & Safety team's commitment is to keep our online community safe. We have invested heavily in human and machine based moderation to remove harmful content quickly and often before it reaches our general community.Your wellbeing is very important to us. As part of this commitment, you will have access to our especially designed wellbeing programmes to support your physical and psychological health and wellbeing.As a Risk Analysis Intern in Trust & Safety, you will become our eyes and ears, researching and analyzing trends, industry changes, and public sentiment that could impact our products. You will be an influential voice, providing insights into public opinion and policy development to further enhance users' trust and safety.What will I be doing?Monitor and analyze public perception towards company products through analyzing news articles and social media sites, using open source research and third-party social listening tools.Conduct investigations on key events in Southeast Asia/Northeast Asia/South Asia, for example: elections, local and international eventsAnalyze and research social issues, online behaviours and archetypes to inform stakeholders of the risks towards Trust and SafetyProduce internal reports that analyzes public perception of Trust and Safety issues routinely.Research and analyze various regulatory information including but not limited to legislation and law enforcement for cyber security, data privacy and social media regulations at both federal and state level in Southeast Asia/Northeast Asia.QualificationsWhat should I bring with me?Undergraduate or graduate student with an educational concentration in Political Science, Journalism, Public Policy, Economics, International Relations, or a related fieldStrong in open-source research, and in digesting information succinctly for stakeholdersGreat communication skills and a strong sense of responsibility. Being able to deliver work quickly with high qualityAble to work independently with minimal supervisionBeing able to work at least 2 days or above per week. The internship duration is at least 3 monthsEnglish proficiency is required along with fluency in either Thai or Tagalog as you will be predominantly covering the Thai or Tagalog speaking market and would require to read and digest information in either Thai or TagalogTikTok is committed to the well-being of all our employees. Our promise is to provide comprehensive and evidence-based programs, to promote and support physical and mental wellbeing throughout each employee's journey with us. We believe that wellbeing is a relationship and that everyone has a part to play, so we work in collaboration and consultation with our employees and across our functions in order to ensure a truly person-centered, innovative, and integrated approach.TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We believe individuals shouldn't be disadvantaged because of their background or identity, but instead should be considered based on their strengths and experience. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

qualification: Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree, Master's Degree
description: TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.We are looking for talented individuals to join us for an internship in 2023. Internships at TikTok aim to offer students industry exposure and hands-on experience. Watch your ambitions become reality as your inspiration brings infinite opportunities at TikTok.Successful candidates must be able to commit to one of the following internship cycles below: -Summer Internship - 08 May 2023 to 28 July 2023 (12 weeks)Off-cycle Internship - Starting 09 January 2023 or 14 August 2023We will prioritize candidates who are able to commit in either internship period. Please state your availability clearly in your resume (Start date, End date).Candidates can apply to a maximum of two positions and will be considered for jobs in the order you apply. The application limit is applicable to TikTok and its affiliates' jobs globally. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis - we encourage you to apply early.Why Join UsAt TikTok, our people are humble, intelligent, compassionate and creative. We create to inspire - for you, for us, and for more than 1 billion users on our platform. We lead with curiosity and aim for the highest, never shying away from taking calculated risks and embracing ambiguity as it comes. Here, the opportunities are limitless for those who dare to pursue bold ideas that exist just beyond the boundary of possibility. Join us and make impact happen with a career at TikTok.About the Stability and Quality TeamThe Stability and Quality team is responsible for ensuring that the services provided by TikTok are highly reliable with low-latency. The team focuses on building and integrating software tools as solutions to improve system reliability, automation and scalability. The solutions include on-call monitoring, automated capacity planning, fault-tolerant business architecture and plans for intelligent failure recovery.ResponsibilitiesEnsure stability of core systems such as TikTok/Live, quickly respond to online accidents, build mechanisms and platforms to improve processing efficiency;Participate in the construction of operation and maintenance tools and platforms, and promote the automation of operation and maintenance;Find system weaknesses and improve projects on the ground through continuous and comprehensive data operations (including availability indicators, historical accidents, resource utilization, etc.);Accumulate best practices in operation and maintenance, provide guidance for business architecture design and component selection, and output operation and maintenance technical documents;Promote the improvement of service reliability, scalability and performance optimization to ensure system SLA.QualificationsUndergraduate, or Postgraduate who is currently pursuing a degree/master in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Systems or a related technical disciplineSolid basic knowledge of computer software, Linux operating system, storage, network IO, etc.Familiarity with one or more general purpose programming languages including but not limited to: Python, Go, Java, PHP, C/C++Ability to solve problems systematicallyGood communication skillsStrong sense of responsibilityTikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.By submitting an application for this role, you accept and agree to our global applicant privacy policy, which may be accessed here: https://careers.tiktok.com/legal/privacy.If you have any questions, please reach out to us.

qualification: Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree, Master's Degree
description: ResponsibilitiesTikTok is the leading destination for short-form video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy.Our Trust & Safety team's commitment is to keep our online community safe. We have invested heavily in human and machine based moderation to remove harmful content quickly and often before it reaches our general community.Your wellbeing is very important to us. As part of this commitment, you will have access to our especially designed wellbeing programmes to support your physical and psychological health and wellbeing.As a Risk Analysis Intern in Trust & Safety, you will become our eyes and ears, researching and analyzing trends, industry changes, and public sentiment that could impact our products. You will be an influential voice, providing insights into public opinion and policy development to further enhance users' trust and safety.What will I be doing?Monitor and analyze public perception towards company products through analyzing news articles and social media sites, using open source research and third-party social listening tools.Conduct investigations on key events in Southeast Asia/Northeast Asia/South Asia, for example: elections, local and international events- Analyze and research social issues, online behaviours and archetypes to inform stakeholders of the risks towards Trust and SafetyProduce internal reports that analyzes public perception of Trust and Safety issues routinely.Research and analyze various regulatory information including but not limited to legislation and law enforcement for cyber security, data privacy and social media regulations at both federal and state level in Southeast Asia/Northeast Asia.QualificationsWhat should I bring with me?Undergraduate or graduate student with an educational concentration in Political Science, Journalism, Public Policy, Economics, International Relations, or a related fieldStrong in open-source research, and in digesting information succinctly for stakeholdersGreat communication skills and a strong sense of responsibility. Being able to deliver work quickly with high qualityAble to work independently with minimal supervisionBeing able to work at least 2 days or above per week. The internship duration is at least 3 monthsEnglish proficiency is required, fluency in either Thai or Tagalog would be advantageous as you might be predominantly covering the Thai or Tagalog speaking market and would require to read and digest information in either Thai or TagalogTikTok is committed to the well-being of all our employees. Our promise is to provide comprehensive and evidence-based programs, to promote and support physical and mental wellbeing throughout each employee's journey with us. We believe that wellbeing is a relationship and that everyone has a part to play, so we work in collaboration and consultation with our employees and across our functions in order to ensure a truly person-centered, innovative, and integrated approach.TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We believe individuals shouldn't be disadvantaged because of their background or identity, but instead should be considered based on their strengths and experience. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

qualification: Higher Secondary/Pre-U/'A' Level
description: Minimum qualifications:Currently pursuing a Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or related technical field.Experience with Google Cloud Platform products and database offerings.Preferred qualifications:Within 12-18 months of completing a Bachelor?€?s or Master?€?s degree.Ability to quickly learn, understand, and work with new and emerging technologies, methodologies, and solutions in the cloud/IT technology space.Excellent analytical skills.About the jobWe appreciate your patience while we consider your application. We will accommodate your school schedule when determining the start date and duration. This internship will run from May/Jun 2023 to Jul/Aug 2023, for a consecutive 10-12 weeks.Google Cloud helps employees and organizations empower their employees, serve their customers, and build what?€?s next for their business ?€? all with technology built in the cloud. Our products are engineered for security, reliability, and scalability, running the full stack from infrastructure to applications to devices and hardware. And our teams are dedicated to helping our customers and developers see the benefits of our technology come to life.In this role, you will inspire businesses, educational institutions, and government agencies to reap the benefits of cloud technologies. You will be seen as a trusted advisor on companies future architecture and operations. You, with your mentor, liaise with cross-functional internal teams to understand industry trends and work with engineering teams to help them devise enhancements and prioritize customer feature requests to Google Cloud products. You will develop technical, communication, and organizational skills, and you will have a chance to further develop experience in our cloud platform. You'll also develop expertise and presentation skills that will be on display to highlight the client?€?s business and technical requirements and persuasively present Google's product offering while mapping those back to the customer requirements and needs.ResponsibilitiesWork with the team to identify and qualify business opportunities, identify key customer technical objections, and develop the strategy to resolve technical impediments to transactions.Work with customer engineers for technical aspects of solutions, to include such activities as supporting bid responses, product and solution briefings, proof-of-concept work, and the coordination of supporting technical resources.Work with Google Cloud Platform products to demonstrate and prototype integrations.

Our science, engineering, and digital technologies are used to solve crimes, save lives, secure our borders, safeguard our data and systems, and enhance public safety and security.What you will be working onInterns may choose to gain exposure to our capabilities in our numerous domains in four broad areas. Capability Planning units, provide HTX-wide support in corporate functions (such as the delivery of core plans and resources). 1. Audit 2. Plans & Strategy3. Strategic Communications 4. Central Procurement OfficeWhat we are looking forCandidates should ideally possess the following characteristics:STEM disciplines/background preferred (Engineering, Computer Science, Sciences, or relevant specialisations)Kindly indicate your top 3 choicesSkills relevant to the S&T domains and are tech savvy and collaborativeCurious, creative, driven, and mission-orientedCommitment of at least three months for the internship periodBesides your academic background, do also share with us your experiences with S&T in school, such as in co-curricular activities. In your resume?€?s last page, please also indicate the following: 1. Your internship period in 2023(dd/mm/yy ?€? dd/mm/yy)2. Your top 3 choices of domains you wish to apply for, in ranking order. Please choose specific domains such as: 1. Biometrics & Profiling CoE,2. Civil Defence PMC, or 3. Plans & Strategy We wish to inform that only shortlisted candidates will be notified within 30 days after the closing date.Please note that any applications with incomplete or missing information will not be considered. As part of the shortlisting process for this role, you may be required to complete a medical declaration and/or undergo further assessment. Please note that you may also be required to declare your vaccination status.-

qualification: Diploma, Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma, Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree
description: TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.We are now looking for talented individuals to join us for an internship in 2022 - people who want to inspire creativity and co-create the future with TikTok.Successful candidates must be able to commit to one of the following internship cycles below:Summer Internship - 09 May 2022 to 29 July 2022 (12 weeks)Off-cycle Internship - 01 August 2022 to 16 December 2022 (20 weeks)We will prioritize candidates who are able to commit to the two above internship periods.Please state your availability clearly in the comments section (Start date, End date).Candidates can apply to a maximum of two positions and will be considered for jobs in the order you apply. The application limit is firm and includes all TikTok/ByteDance jobs globally. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis and we encourage you to apply early.About the Business Risk Integrated Control (BRIC) teamThe Business Risk Integrated Control (BRIC) team is missioned to:Protect users, including and beyond content consumers, creators, advertisers;Secure platform health and community experience authenticity;Build infrastructures, platforms and technologies, as well as to collaborate with many cross-functional teams and stakeholders.The BRIC team works to minimize the damage of inauthentic behaviors on platforms, covering multiple classical and novel community and business risk areas such as account integrity, engagement authenticity, anti spam, API abuse, growth fraud, live streaming security and financial safety (ads or e-commerce), etc.In this team you'll have a unique opportunity to have first-hand exposure to the strategy of the company in key security initiatives, especially in building scalable and robust, intelligent and privacy-safe, secure and product-friendly systems and solutions. Our challenges are not some regular day-to-day technical puzzles -- You'll be part of a team that's developing novel solutions to first-seen challenges of a non-stop evolvement of a phenomenal product eco-system. The work needs to be fast, transferrable, while still down to the ground to making quick and solid differences.Responsibilities:Build rules, algorithms and machine learning models, to respond to and mitigate business risks in products/platforms. Such risks include and are not limited to abusive accounts, fake engagements, spammy redirection, scraping, fraud, etc.;Analyze business and security data, uncover evolving attack motions, identify weaknesses and opportunities in risk defense solutions, explore new space from the discoveries;Define risk control measurements, quantify, generalize and monitor risk related business and operational metrics, and align risk teams and their stakeholders on risk control numeric goals, promote impact-oriented, data-driven data science practices for risks.Qualifications:Undergraduate, or Postgraduate who is currently pursuing a degree/master in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Internet Security or a related technical discipline;Proficiency in data/statistical analytical tools, such as SQL, R and Python;Ability to think and communicate critically, rigorously and concisely;Strong sense of ownership and urgency, proactive and skillful communication, ability to handle high complexity problems and cross-functional alignment while being consistently independent, objective and rational;Experience in academia or industry leading skills in online social/content platforms, online commercial or financial businesses, state-of-art machine learning theories and applications would be advantageous.

description: Position Title: Sustainable Finance Palm Oil InternDepartment: Conservation (Global Palm Oil)Reports to: Global Palm Oil TeamLocation: SingaporeDate: 3 months/ 6 monthsAbout World Wide Fund for Nature, Singapore (WWF)WWF-Singapore is a Singapore-registered charity, a network member of WWF International ?€? one of the world?€?s largest and most respected independent conservation organisations. WWF-Singapore protects critical resources for people in Singapore by driving change across government, business, civil society and local communities. To meet key conservation goals, we address issues such as deforestation, haze pollution, seafood sustainability and illegal wildlife trade in Singapore and around the region. We deliver transformational corporate partnerships, fundraising to execute local and global conservation programmes and projects and community outreach to achieve WWF?€?s global goals for food, forests, oceans, water, wildlife, and climate and energy. As one of WWF?€?s global hubs, WWF-Singapore supports a global network that spans over 100 countries.WWF?€?s vision is a future where all palm oil is produced without causing deforestation, peatland and environmental degradation or harming wildlife, where workers are treated fairly, and communities' rights are respected, and producers including smallholder farmers have access to tools for responsible production and access to benefit from the market for responsible palm oil.WWF?€?s Goals For Palm Oil Are ToProtect: Wildlife and the environment is protected from expansion, and palm oil driven deforestation and natural habitat conversion is haltedProduce: Production is sustainable in resilient and biodiverse landscapes, no longer contributes to climate change, and the industry provides sustainable livelihoods, reduces poverty and respects human rightsRestore: The industry becomes a driver for wildlife conservation and restoration efforts, ensuring that landscapes with palm oil are healthy and livingMajor Functions:Sustainable finance is an important instrument in driving stakeholders across the value chain towards WWF?€?s sustainable palm oil agenda. To do this, we work with key finance sector players including banks, investors, regulators, and stock exchanges. As a sustainable finance intern within the global palm oil team, you will be doing research and building business case studies on the good practices within the financial institutions on sustainable palm oil policies and tools. In the course of the project, you will be working closely with members of the Global Palm Oil Team, Asia Sustainable Finance Team and WWF offices around the world to build upon your work.Major Duties and Responsibilities:Conduct relevant literature review and analysis of the sustainable finance market related to the palm oil industry (including but not limited to Bankable Nature-Based Solutions, Regenerative Agriculture, Net Zero targets of companies & governments and Climate Change)Stakeholder Mapping of FIs and banks in priority markets based on findings from the WWF?€?s finance flow study and researchLinking sustainable finance to regulations of central banks and financial regulatorsManage research on palm oil supply chains, ESG issues and other sustainable finance related topics; design internal briefs and presentations for WWF officesPrepare workshop materials ?€? presentation slides and case studiesPerform other related duties as needed to ensure the efficient and effective functioning of the teamRequired Qualifications and Skills:Degree curriculum, in either finance, economics, sustainable development, or environment managementMasters in finance or economics is preferredA good understanding of how environmental concerns relate to material business risks and opportunitiesGeneral knowledge of the finance sector levers for change as they relate to sustainabilityStrong written and verbal communication skills in English, along with the maturity to work in a global, multi-cultural environmentFlexibility and ability to work on other projects as neededStrong research, analytical and data management skillsGood organisational skillsThis job description covers the main tasks. Other tasks may be assigned as necessary according to organisational needs.We may also disclose personal data about you to our affiliates in the network in order to manage our relationship with you.Interested candidates are required to submit their cover letter and resume to the HR Department of WWF-Singapore (Email: **@wwf.sg). Please indicate the position being applied for ?€?Sustainable Finance Palm Oil Intern?€? in the subject line.Important Note: Applications without a cover letter will not be considered.-

They will also be involved in end-user and business stakeholder communications.SAP will be prioritizing applicants who have a current right to work in Singapore, and do not require SAP's sponsorship of a visa.EXPECTATIONS AND TASKSCollaborate with other AI Scientists, Engineers, and Product Owners etcCommunicate with stakeholders to understand SAP business processesSupport the end-to-end MLOps lifecycle (Python, Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, KFServing, etc.)Apply existing SAP AI or open-sourced solutions to solve business problemsLearn the latest advancements in applied Natural Language Processing (NLP), Computer Vision (CV) and DevOpsAble to commit at least 12 working weeksEDUCATION AND QUALIFICATIONS / SKILLS AND COMPETENCIESRequired skillsProficiency in Python, and libraries such as Pandas, Scikit-Learn, etcUnderstanding of basic Machine Learning, algorithms and data structuresExperience with development tools like VScode, Pycharm, Jupyter, Docker, Git, etcCuriosity to learn about different AI applicationsAble to take ownership of one?€?s work and collaborate with othersPreferred skillsDriven individual (with an active Github/Gitlab project portfolio)Good communication skills with end-users and business stakeholdersAdditional certificates and courses focusing on machine learning are a plus but not a mustWORK EXPERIENCEUndergraduate or graduate students in STEM fields from any universityStudents with non-technical majors and self-learned data science skills are welcome to applyAvailable to start on June 2022LOCATIONSingapore (flexible and trust-based workspace)We are SAPSAP innovations help more than 400,000 customers worldwide work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively. Originally known for leadership in enterprise resource planning (ERP) software, SAP has evolved to become a market leader in end-to-end business application software and related services for database, analytics, intelligent technologies, and experience management. As a cloud company with 200 million users and more than 100,000 employees worldwide, we are purpose-driven and future-focused, with a highly collaborative team ethic and commitment to personal development. Whether connecting global industries, people, or platforms, we help ensure every challenge gets the solution it deserves. At SAP, we build breakthroughs, together.Our inclusion promiseSAP?€?s culture of inclusion, focus on health and well-being, and flexible working models help ensure that everyone ?€? regardless of background ?€? feels included and can run at their best. At SAP, we believe we are made stronger by the unique capabilities and qualities that each person brings to our company, and we invest in our employees to inspire confidence and help everyone realize their full potential. We ultimately believe in unleashing all talent and creating a better and more equitable world.
