description: How Will You Make an Impact?Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc. (NYSE: TMO) is the world leader in serving science, with annual revenue of approximately $40 billion. Our Mission is to enable our customers to make the world healthier, cleaner and safer. Whether our customers are accelerating life sciences research, solving complex analytical challenges, increasing productivity in their laboratories, improving patient health through diagnostics or the development and manufacture of life-changing therapies, we are here to support them. Our global team of more than 100,000 colleagues delivers an unrivaled combination of innovative technologies, purchasing convenience and pharmaceutical services through our industry-leading brands, including Thermo Scientific, Applied Biosystems, Invitrogen, Fisher Scientific, Unity Lab Services, Patheon and PPD. For more information, please visit??www.thermofisher.com.What will you do?The Research Intern will work closely with an assigned scientific supervisor on lab-based cell culture tasks. The candidate will primarily assist upstream cell culture activities focused on internal projects for development of scientific literature as well as in external Client?€?s projects related to media development. This is an excellent opportunity to develop bioprocessing skills and techniques and develop one?€?s skills in designing experiments, analyzing, and interpreting data. This is also an opportunity to observe Client interactions through scientific presentations and discussions. Active participation in journal clubs and internal discussions is encouraged will be highly beneficial to the candidate?€?s growth. Cross-training in downstream techniques and assisting the analytical scientist will be an added benefit to the overall development of the candidate. Overall, the learning opportunities in this role will help shape the scientific mindset and development of the candidate for a future career in the biotechnology industry.The responsibilities will include:Supporting bioprocess laboratory operations i.e., suspension cell culture, bioreactor operations, and small-scale experiments to support process implementation.Assisting in growing and maintaining cultures, cell banking, stability, and characterization studies; assay development at a later stageAssisting in preparation of media and reagents for upstream and downstream activities.Coordinating maintenance of equipment, lab facilities and procurement with the teamAttending client meetings and actively participating in technical discussionsFollowing health and safety protocols as requiredAssisting in maintaining lab records and inventoriesHow will you get here?EducationEnrollment in an undergraduate program leading to a Degree in Biological Sciences, Biomedical Sciences or Life Sciences - related discipline.ExperienceExperience in wet-laboratory operations and aseptic techniques is an advantageKnowledge, Skills, Abilities:.Ability to work independently as well as in a team is a requisite.Strong verbal and written communication skills and a pro-active mindset are required.Basic computer skills are necessary.Learning outcome (at least 3 points):Developing skills in cell culture and bioprocessing techniquesDeveloping skills and knowledge in media developmentAn opportunity to cross-train in basic Downstream techniquesBuilding confidence to communicate experimental results through writing and oral presentationsOverall development of soft skills (communication, interpersonal relations, and best workplace practices)

TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.We are now looking for talented individuals to join us for an internship in 2022 - people who want to inspire creativity and co-create the future with TikTok.Successful candidates must be able to commit to one of the following internship cycles below: -Summer Internship - 09 May 2022 to 29 July 2022 (12 weeks)Off-cycle Internship - 01 August 2022 to 16 December 2022 (20 weeks)We will prioritize candidates who are able to commit to the two above internship periods.Please state your availability clearly in the comments section (Start date, End date).Candidates can apply to a maximum of two positions and will be considered for jobs in the order you apply. With the continuous efforts from our team, TikTok is able to provide the best user experience and bring joy to everyone in the world.ResponsibilitiesBuild industry-leading content safety systems for TikTok;Develop highly-scalable classifiers, tools, models and algorithms leveraging cutting-edge machine learning, computer vision and data mining technologies;Understand product objectives and improve trust and safety strategy and model's performance;Work with cross-functional teams to protect TikTok globally.QualificationsUndergraduate, or Postgraduate who is currently pursuing a degree/master in computer science or a related technical discipline;Solid experience in at least one of the following areas: machine learning, pattern recognition, NLP, data mining, or computer vision;Experience in recommendation, search, advertising, or other related projects;Published papers in the top AI conferences or journals is a plus, including KDD, IJCAI, WWW, WSDM, ICML, NeurIPS, CVPR, ECCV, ICCV, ACL, etc.;Competition experience in machine learning, data mining, CV, NLP, etc.;Good understanding of data structures and algorithms;Passion for techniques and solving challenging problems.By submitting an application for this role, you accept and agree to our global applicant privacy policy, which may be accessed here: https://careers.tiktok.com/legal/privacy.

qualification: Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree, Master's Degree
description: TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.We are now looking for talented individuals to join us for an internship in 2022 - people who want to inspire creativity and co-create the future with TikTok.Successful candidates must be able to commit to one of the following internship cycles below:Summer Internship - 09 May 2022 to 29 July 2022 (12 weeks)Off-cycle Internship - 01 August 2022 to 16 December 2022 (20 weeks)We will prioritize candidates who are able to commit to the two above internship periods.Please state your availability clearly in the comments section (Start date, End date).Candidates can apply to a maximum of two positions and will be considered for jobs in the order you apply. The application limit is firm and includes all TikTok/ByteDance jobs globally. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis and we encourage you to apply early.About the Business Risk Integrated Control (BRIC) teamThe Business Risk Integrated Control (BRIC) team is missioned to:Protect users, including and beyond content consumers, creators, advertisers;Secure platform health and community experience authenticity;Build infrastructures, platforms and technologies, as well as to collaborate with many cross-functional teams and stakeholders.The BRIC team works to minimize the damage of inauthentic behaviors on platforms, covering multiple classical and novel community and business risk areas such as account integrity, engagement authenticity, anti spam, API abuse, growth fraud, live streaming security and financial safety (ads or e-commerce), etc.In this team you'll have a unique opportunity to have first-hand exposure to the strategy of the company in key security initiatives, especially in building scalable and robust, intelligent and privacy-safe, secure and product-friendly systems and solutions. Our challenges are not some regular day-to-day technical puzzles -- You'll be part of a team that's developing novel solutions to first-seen challenges of a non-stop evolvement of a phenomenal product eco-system. The work needs to be fast, transferrable, while still down to the ground to making quick and solid differences.ResponsibilitiesProvide risk assessment and risk solution plans for different products and businesses, promote the implementation of relevant plans, and ensure the safe development of TikTok, live broadcast, e-commerce and advertising business;Develop forward-looking risk control strategies through analyzing user behavior, content, user feedback and other data, drive the improvement and upgrade of product safety mechanism, and be responsible for the effect of risk solution plans;Cooperate with risk control RD, build and improve risk perception, identification, intervention and governance effect measurement system, and design common risk control products and services that can support different businesses;Conduct in-depth investigation into the changing trend of CIB networks in different countries, and be sensitive to the company's business and strategy; be able to discern new risk points from the industry and business trends, deploy risk control mechanisms in advance to prevent the occurrence of risks, and ensure that the risk control ability is at the leading level in the industry.QualificationsUndergraduate, or Postgraduate who is currently pursuing a degree/master in Computer Science, Information Security, Statistics, Mathematics or a related technical discipline;Interest in working on internet products, preferably in strategy, risk control or related fields;Strong sense of responsibility and team spirit, excellent learning ability, and goal-oriented;High curiosity and self-motivation, with a willingness to accept challenges and aim for the best.By submitting an application for this role, you accept and agree to our global applicant privacy policy, which may be accessed here: https://careers.tiktok.com/legal/privacy.

company: MCI - Cyber Security Agency of Singapore
qualification: Not Specified
description: What the role isThe main aim of this ongoing project is to add on to the capabilities of our PT testbed continually. Over time, this testbed will become a repository for defensive and PT knowledge and tools that can be easily demonstrated and conducive for self-learning and applied cybersecurity research. The scope is to research, design, develop, evaluate, experiment and document on topics within a technology domain of interest that support the various aspects of the PT process.These may include any subset of the following depending on the current developmental stage of the project, the intern?€?s areas of interest and technical competencies. i. Research on a particular topic ii.Design testbed and scenarios to support the study of the topic iii. Develop proof-of-concept (PoC) and set up testbediv. Evaluate PoC and related tools within the testbed v. Experiment, optimise and measure effectiveness and performancevi. Document and present findingsWhat you will be working onThis project exposes interns to various tools (both defensive and for PT), providing them with the exposure from the setting up of hardened enterprise network testbed, designing of PT scenarios, conducting of PT to the evaluation of the tools used in support of the PT process. Tools: KaliLinux, Beyond Security BeStorm, Rapid7 Nexpose, Nessus, AppSpider, Metasploit, Immunity Canvas, Core Impact, Innuendo, RainbowCrack, Ophcrack, USB Rubber Ducky, Pineapple Wi-Fi (DNSSpoof, URLSnarf, Karma, nmap, mdk3, etc.), fuzzing frameworks and any other relevant tools to support the PT process, e.g. team collaboration tools, knowledge repository, etc. Platforms: OS (Windows, Linux, iOS, Android), Networks (wired, wireless, cloud), Controls (network access control, firewalls, privileged access management controls, database activity monitoring), etc.Deliverables: PoC and testbed. Project report documenting the setup, PoC and tools configuration, experiment details and findings. Presentation and demonstration with actual testbed.What we are looking forApplication Requirements: Strong interest and experience in the following:Cybersecurity network/system administration and setupProgramming (C/C++/Java/Python/Assembly)Reverse engineering, fuzzing, penetration testing, software vulnerabilities and exploits would be an added advantage.The candidate should also be creative, a good team player, willing to learn, adaptive and proactive.Application Details: To apply, please submit your cover letter indicating your internship availability period, resume and latest transcripts (poly and/or university). Incomplete applications may not be considered. Shortlisted candidates should hear from us within 2 to 4 weeks from date of application. Due to the high volume of applications we receive, we seek your understanding that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. Internship Period: Jan - Jun 2023-

job_title: Risk Analysis Intern - Trust & Safety - Thai/Tagalog Speaking
qualification: Professional Certificate/NiTEC, Diploma, Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma, Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree
description: ResponsibilitiesTikTok is the leading destination for short-form video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy.Our Trust & Safety team's commitment is to keep our online community safe. We have invested heavily in human and machine based moderation to remove harmful content quickly and often before it reaches our general community.Your wellbeing is very important to us. As part of this commitment, you will have access to our especially designed wellbeing programmes to support your physical and psychological health and wellbeing.As a Risk Analysis Intern in Trust & Safety, you will become our eyes and ears, researching and analyzing trends, industry changes, and public sentiment that could impact our products. You will be an influential voice, providing insights into public opinion and policy development to further enhance users' trust and safety.What will I be doing?Monitor and analyze public perception towards company products through analyzing news articles and social media sites, using open source research and third-party social listening tools.Conduct investigations on key events in Southeast Asia/Northeast Asia/South Asia, for example: elections, local and international eventsAnalyze and research social issues, online behaviours and archetypes to inform stakeholders of the risks towards Trust and SafetyProduce internal reports that analyzes public perception of Trust and Safety issues routinely.Research and analyze various regulatory information including but not limited to legislation and law enforcement for cyber security, data privacy and social media regulations at both federal and state level in Southeast Asia/Northeast Asia.QualificationsWhat should I bring with me?Undergraduate or graduate student with an educational concentration in Political Science, Journalism, Public Policy, Economics, International Relations, or a related fieldStrong in open-source research, and in digesting information succinctly for stakeholdersGreat communication skills and a strong sense of responsibility. Being able to deliver work quickly with high qualityAble to work independently with minimal supervisionBeing able to work at least 2 days or above per week. The internship duration is at least 3 monthsEnglish proficiency is required along with fluency in either Thai or Tagalog as you will be predominantly covering the Thai or Tagalog speaking market and would require to read and digest information in either Thai or TagalogTikTok is committed to the well-being of all our employees. Our promise is to provide comprehensive and evidence-based programs, to promote and support physical and mental wellbeing throughout each employee's journey with us. We believe that wellbeing is a relationship and that everyone has a part to play, so we work in collaboration and consultation with our employees and across our functions in order to ensure a truly person-centered, innovative, and integrated approach.TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We believe individuals shouldn't be disadvantaged because of their background or identity, but instead should be considered based on their strengths and experience. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

capacity planning and accurate forecasting for proper integrity coverage in the anticipation of launches.Coordinate the rollout of policy updates related to the new and previous launches to maintain self-driven. The algorithm capacities include the identification of a customer's incoming line, the intention understanding, and the solutions to various kinds of questions, etc.The team is also responsible for the language quality of our overseas e-commerce platform (e.g., TikTok shopping, Fanno), including improving machine translation quality of products' information, IM of buyers and sellers, and supporting scenario of cross-lingual searching.ResponsibilitiesResponsible for NLP-related research and development, which mainly includes:Language understanding, including intention recognition, emotion recognition, FAQ, etc.;Building an intelligent dialogue system, including mining questions and answers;Multilingual text generation such as products' copy, dialogue summary, email reply, etc.;Machine translation, including the translation of product titles and details, IM and other scenarios;Cross-lingual search, including cross language matching, cross-lingual vector retrieval, etc.QualificationsUndergraduate, or Postgraduate who is currently pursuing a degree/master in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a related technical discipline;Familiar with at least one computer programming language, including but not limited to C, C++, Java, Go, Python;Candidates who demonstrated research experience in published papers including but not limited to: ACL, EMNLP, NAACL, NIPS, ICML would be advantageous.By submitting an application for this role, you accept and agree to our global applicant privacy policy, which may be accessed here: https://careers.tiktok.com/legal/privacy.

description: ResponsibilitiesTikTok is the leading destination for short-form video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy.Our Trust & Safety team's commitment is to keep our online community safe. We have invested heavily in human and machine-based moderation to remove harmful content quickly and often before it reaches our general community.The Trust & Safety Policy team develops and reviews our community policies to promote a positive and safe environment for all of our Users and Content Creators to enjoy and express themselves.ResponsibilitiesAnalyze and assess content policy related data and issues around specific topicsWork with internal policy, risk, and other Trust & Safety teams to collate information on key policy trends and developmentsConduct research on key issue areas within our Community Guidelines to help inform our policy development workProduce internal reports which help drive company thinking behind content policy decision making globallyQualificationsWhat should I bring with me?Undergraduate students with strong research, writing and analytical skills.Outstanding organizational, research, and communication skills, with a strong willingness to learn;Interest to understand concepts and issues of user safety on social media, with a particular passion in any area relevant to TikTok's Community Guidelines;Ability to commit to a full time internship based in Singapore for at least 10 weeks.English proficiency is required. In addition, proficiency in another language would be an advantage as this person might be involved in projects relating to reviewing global content and may be required to read and digest information in other languages.TikTok is committed to the wellbeing of all our employees. Our promise is to provide comprehensive and evidence-based programs, to promote and support physical and mental wellbeing throughout each employee's journey with us. We believe that wellbeing is a relationship and that everyone has a part to play, so we work in collaboration and consultation with our employees and across our functions in order to ensure a truly person-centred, innovative and integrated approach.TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. We believe individuals shouldn't be disadvantaged because of their background or identity, but instead should be considered based on their strengths and experience. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

qualification: Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree
description: Title: Data Analytics - Intern (6mths internship)What impact will you make?At Deloitte, we offer a unique and exceptional career experience to inspire and empower talents like you to make an impact that matters for our clients, people and community. Whatever your aspirations, Deloitte offers you a highly inclusive, collaborative workplace and unrivalled opportunities to realize your full potential. We are always looking for people with the relentless energy to push themselves further, and to find new avenues and unique ways to reach our shared goals.So what are you waiting for? Join the winning team now.Work you?€?ll doData sits at the heart of every organization and is relied upon for all aspects of operations, analysis, decision-making, reporting and regulatory requirements. Audit Analytics is an exciting and thriving area at Deloitte. Our practitioners work with leading global, regional, and local clients where audit analytics makes the difference by providing actionable insights, bringing efficiency, and fostering innovation. The Audit Analytics team works as a multi-disciplinary team within the Audit function to support them across a range of industries.Within the Audit Analytics team, you will contribute to the Audit Analytics strategy for Deloitte Singapore, being involved with execution of audit analytics projects to increase the quality, efficiency, and value of our financial audits. Tasks ranges from data extraction, loading and cleaning activities to data analyses and visualization of results through interactive dashboards. You will be responsible for the timely delivery of high-quality work, help develop new analytical procedures, and communicate with internal and external client stakeholders.Occasionally, you will be working closely with business stakeholders to identify opportunities for advisory work, where creation and communication of value-adding proposals that clearly distinguishes Deloitte as the clear choice is expected with the guidance of managers. As you progress in your role, you are expected to demonstrate either through oral presentation or conceptualization of deliverables to establish our expertise in the required technical fields.Tasks will include:Data manipulation using tools such as Microsoft SQL, Python, R and/or Excel VBA to load and transform raw data into standard data models.Data visualization using tools such as Qlik, Tableau or Power BIPerform data quality checks and reconciliations to verify the completeness of datasets provided to you. This task will require a degree of problem solving and the ability to understand basic accounting concepts. (trainings will be provided on accounting concepts)Manage a portfolio of audit analytics engagement, ensuring tasks are being done on time and in an efficient and accurate manner.Assist and guide Audit teams with data extraction from client systems.Perform data analysis using internally created audit analytics packages or develop custom solutions.Your role as a leaderAt Deloitte, we believe in the importance of empowering our people to be leaders at all levels. We expect our people to embrace and live our purpose and shared values, challenging themselves everyday to identify issues that are most important to our clients, our people and the communities, and to make an impact that matters. In addition to living our purpose, Associates / Analysts / Consultants across our Firm are expected to:Understand the expectations set and demonstrates personal accountability for keeping own performance on track.Understand how our daily work contributes to the priorities of the team and the business.Demonstrate strong commitment to personal learning and development.Actively focus on developing effective communication and relationship-building skills, with stakeholders, clients and team.Work effectively in diverse teams within a highly inclusive team culture where everyone is supported, respected and recognized for their contribution.RequirementsUndergraduate, preferably studying in the fields of Computer Science, Mathematics or Data Analytics related.Hands on experience with tools preferred, such asDatabase technology (Preferably MS SQL)Visualization software such as Qlik /Tableau/ Power BIPython and/or RAble to handle data ambiguity and demonstrated critical thinking skillsStrong interpersonal skills (verbal and written) and the ability to work in a team with an attention to detailsAbility and willingness to learn new tools/solutionsDue to volume of applications, we regret only shortlisted candidates will be notified. Candidates will only be contacted by authorized Deloitte Recruiters via firm?€?s business contact number or business email address.

description: ResponsibilitiesTikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.We are looking for talented individuals to join us! As an intern Engineer, you'll have the chance to work with our clients and teams to address key business problems and identify areas of growth for the company. You will play a key role in ensuring TikTok continues healthy growth and delivers the best product experience to all of our users to help them enjoy their time on TikTok.Potential TeamsIf you're looking for challenging ground to push your limits, here are some potential teams to kickstart your careerGlobal LivestreamingOur team focuses on delivering engaging and the best live streaming experience to global users. We develop creative and interesting features for streamers and viewers to express themselves and interact with others instantly.SocialTikTok Social team's mission is to facilitate meaningful user connections through TikTok's messaging experience. Our team drives significant user engagement and retention wins through fun, innovative, and technically sophisticated products and features. Some core features and components we build and maintain include User Profile, Story, Inbox, Messaging, Follow, Like, Comment, Tag, etc.Privacy & SecurityOur team aims to build a trusted platform by promoting privacy by design - we design architectures that treat user data respectfully, with transparency, and in line with reasonable practices. We build novel solutions to first-seen challenges of a non-stop evolution of a phenomenal product eco-system.Frontend + Web ArchitectureOur team builds and maintains the web products and infrastructure for TikTok, including www.tiktok.com, hybrid pages in the mobile app, and TikTok TV. Our goal is to build stable, sustainable, and reusable infrastructure, so that each product team can develop, test, and deploy their features more efficiently and effectively.TestingOur goal is to facilitate the successful release of TikTok features and enhancements from development to production through effective testing delivering continuous quality at speed. We own the entire system testing process, including but not limited to: analysis, design, executing test plans and cases, and conducting defect tracking.Stability and Quality teamThe Stability and Quality team is responsible for ensuring that the services provided by TikTok are highly reliable with low-latency. The solutions include on-call monitoring, automated capacity planning, fault-tolerant business architecture and plans for intelligent failure recovery.QualificationsUndergraduate, or Postgraduate with a background in Software Development, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a related technical disciplineProficiency in coding & scripting languages such as C/C++, Java, Kotlin, Objective-C, Swift, JavaScript or PythonSolid understanding of computer science and strong problem solving skillsGood team communication and collaboration skillsPrior experience in mobile development (Android/iOS apps) is a plusBy submitting an application for this role, you accept and agree to our global applicant privacy policy, which may be accessed here: https://careers.tiktok.com/legal/privacy.Assessment process will primarily commence from Mid-August 2022.

job_title: Barclays Singapore - Compliance Analyst - Explorer Summer Intern Programme - 2023
qualification: Not Specified
description: About UsBarclays is a British universal bank. We are diversified by business, by different types of customers and clients, and by geography. Our businesses include consumer banking and payments operations around the world, as well as a top-tier, full service, global corporate and investment bank, all of which are supported by our service company which provides technology, operations and functional services across the Group.The team that protects our businessAt Barclays, our reputation means everything. Our Compliance team is at the heart of our business, helping the Group confidently navigate all the laws and regulations that govern our industry ?€? and enabling our success. This team defines, applies and advises on decision-making boundaries, empowering everyone at Barclays to continuously uphold our values and achieve our goals. Sound like the place for you? Join us as a summer analyst to find out.Real responsibility, right awayAs a summer analyst, you?€?ll spend the summer with our team, building a solid foundation in Compliance and helping the Group deliver our strategy. You?€?ll either join one of our business-facing teams, supporting a particular business division, or one of our firm-wide core teams, supporting the entire Group. You may:review policy breaches and escalations to identify themes and create recommendations to increase efficiencydraft procedures for regulatory disclosuresadvise colleagues about regulation related to specific products and serviceshelp maintain the barrier between private side and public side teamswork closely with IT to represent Compliance requirements for new systems.A place where you can thriveAt Barclays, you?€?ll be surrounded by people who will help you achieve your ambitions. Our collaborative, supportive environment gives you the chance to build solid relationships with senior leaders and peers alike. During the programme, you?€?ll also:participate in formal and informal trainingconnect with junior and senior mentorsattend dedicated networking sessions and other programme eventsreceive detailed performance feedbackgive back to the community through volunteer events.And if you really impress us, this could be the beginning of an incredible career. We invite top-performing, eligible summer analysts to join us as full-time Compliance analysts after graduation.To be considered for this programme, you must:be an undergraduate student with an anticipated graduation date between December 2023 - June 2024.Ideally, you would also have:a GPA of 3.2 or aboveunrestricted respective locations work authorizationresourcefulness, leadership, team-orientation, enthusiasm and an entrepreneurial spirit, demonstrated through participation in extracurricular activities.Ready to apply?Visit *************** to learn more about our opportunities and apply.It is the policy of Barclays to ensure equal employment opportunity without discrimination or harassment on the basis of race, color, creed, religion, national origin, alienage or citizenship status, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, marital or domestic/civil partnership status, disability, protected veteran status, genetic information, or any other basis protected by law.-

description: ResponsibilitiesTikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.The Growth team plays a core role in acquisition, activation, and retention of billions of users, through our globally popular products such as TikTok, Resso, CapCut, Helo, etc. We are building platform foundation, leveraging data and ML models, and providing end-to-end solutions to power global growth of our products. description: JUNIOR CREATIVE JOB DESCRIPTIONRawspark is looking for a Junior Creative Intern who is able to craft inspiring marketing content to the designated audiences.Applicants should:Be proficient or have experience in developing marketing strategies and conceptualising creative content, collaterals and copies for clients.Be up-to-date on marketing trends and channels including social media platforms (e.g. Youtube, Tiktok, Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, Mailchimp, Google Smart Campaigns etc).Design creative content and ensure brand consistency of clients for various social media and platforms (e.g. Youtube, Tiktok, Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, Mailchimp, Google Smart Campaigns etc).Provides active support for creative agency and clients.An experience working alongside agencies, creatives and brands preferable.Whacky copywriting skills and great sense of humour.Ability to handle traffic management in projects and raise team awareness before hitting crunch period.Have excellent written and verbal communication.Be able to work in a fast-paced industry.Be highly self-motivated, with a drive for self-improvement.Well versed with pop culture, street culture, music and local culture.Happy to work in a small team of dedicated individuals, who specialise in video editing, production management, sound design, music, and producing.Participate in creative sessions and brainstorming.Requirements:Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite particularly Photoshop and Illustrator.Responsible, organised and able to meet timelines.Able to work independently and yet a team player.Enjoy music, arts and entertainment in general.Interested applicants must submit their CV, resume or application to ******@rawsparkgroup.comThis will be a paid internship.-

description: About UsEstablished in 2019, Infinix Hospitality Management Pte Ltd is a budding cleaning company that provides a suite of cleaning services, ranging from commercial contractual cleaning, upholstery, facility maintenance and residential cleaning services. We are focused on delivering bespoke services that are customer-centric and time-critical, we operate synonymously with our customers' core values so that our clients can focus on their core business.We look to commit to growing our manpower resources and invest in technology to achieve a competitive advantage. While internalizing operations, process workflows, contract procurement, service delivery and interoperability of our business functions. We are focus on continuous improvement and look to strive to emerge as the industry's leading cleaning service provider.Speedy Industrial has a dynamic and fast-moving work culture and will seek for like-minded individuals to join and grow with us and continue to provide the best service to our customers1. Your entrepreneurial spirit and vision in directing business functions will assist our organization in maintaining relationships with clients, increasing staff productivity, improving service, ensuring sustainability, and meeting business objectives.2. Specific Responsibilities As our new Sales Consultant you will:Develop strategic plans for optimized productivityReview and improve organizational effectiveness by developing processes, overseeing employees, establishing a highly motivational work environment, and creating innovative approaches to improvementUphold standards of excellence and soaring qualitySeek out opportunities for expansion and growth by developing new business relationshipsProvide guidance and feedback to help others strengthen specific knowledge/skill areas3. qualification: Higher Secondary/Pre-U/'A' Level, Professional Certificate/NiTEC
description: How Will You Make an Impact?Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc. (NYSE: TMO) is the world leader in serving science, with annual revenue of approximately $40 billion. Our Mission is to enable our customers to make the world healthier, cleaner and safer. Whether our customers are accelerating life sciences research, solving complex analytical challenges, increasing productivity in their laboratories, improving patient health through diagnostics or the development and manufacture of life-changing therapies, we are here to support them. Our global team of more than 100,000 colleagues delivers an unrivaled combination of innovative technologies, purchasing convenience and pharmaceutical services through our industry-leading brands, including Thermo Scientific, Applied Biosystems, Invitrogen, Fisher Scientific, Unity Lab Services, Patheon and PPD. For more information, please visit www.thermofisher.comWhat will you do?For our Biosciences Division (BID) for South East Asia and Taiwan (SE&TW) , we are looking to add a bright and driven Life Sciences intern to the Marketing team based in Singapore. The Biosciences division has been at the forefront helping us fulfill our Mission of enabling our customers to make the world healthier, cleaner and safer this year more than ever with our instruments and consumables being used in efforts to battle the COVID-19 pandemic.The job responsibilities of the intern will be to:Support the BID Marketing team across SEATW in the execution and communication of tactics based on set strategies, with a focus on our Cell Biology and Protein and Cell Analysis portfoliosAssist in the account and content management of our training tool Brainshark and our sales tool AlexandriaAid in the preparation of the virtual events and conferencesCoordinate the printing and subsequent shipping of brochures from Singapore to our dealers in SEAHow will you get here?Education :Currently enrolled in a Life Sciences/Biological Sciences university program in SingaporeExperience :None RequiredLearning outcomes:This is an exciting opportunity to work directly with the Marketing Manager for SEATw and gain valuable guidance and on-the-job training for a long term career. The successful candidate will learn:To use life sciences knowledge to practical application to help sell key products and consumablesTo understand the marketing life cycle and gain valuable product knowledge and application of science background in commercial strategyTo understand content delivery and sales platforms. This is an added advantage for someone looking to build a fulltime career in technical sales or product marketing in the scientific instruments and consumables space.Develop and hone business acumen through regular interactions with cross functional teams including Sales and technical product specialists.At Thermo Fisher Scientific, each one of our 80,000 extraordinary minds has a unique story to tell. Join us and contribute to our singular mission?€?enabling our customers to make the world healthier, cleaner and safer. Apply today http://jobs.thermofisher.comThermo Fisher Scientific is an EEO/Affirmative Action Employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, disability or any other legally protected status.

description: Launch the next wave of cash management and payment solutions.Help drive innovation across global payments and be at the forefront of innovation. Our program puts you at the lead of executing comprehensive client solutions for multinational corporates, financial institutions, and public sector clients.What You'll DoYou?€?ll learn what it means to move money in this nine-week program. You?€?ll interact with clients and internal partners while experiencing our commitment to excellence in client service.Who We're Looking ForValued qualitiesA self-starter with??a collaborative mindset and willingness to partner and work in a team; enthusiasm, energy, and a drive to succeed; steady focus, innovative approach, exceptional service, and execution.Key skillsCreative problem-solving abilities both on your own and with a team; exceptional analytical, research and project management skills; familiarity with business fundamentals.What We OfferOn-the-job experienceYou?€?ll gain hands-on experience in large scale payments and corporate financial institutions that help make money move. The Wholesale Payments & Corporate Banking program offers you the opportunity to gain experience by helping develop presentations, completing analyses, pricing and cash flows, and conducting client due diligence. You?€?ll build your technical skills and knowledge of the financial service industry, incorporating emerging technologies based on a holistic view of the payments landscape.TrainingKick off the summer with one week of finance fundamentals training, followed by product specific and supplemental instruction. Access to senior management and a strong network of peers will promote ongoing professional development throughout the summer.Career ProgressionFrom day one you will start to build your network while sharpening your technical skills and knowledge of cash management and payment solutions. Top performing summer analysts may receive a full-time offer to join the two year Wholesale Payments & Corporate Banking rotational analyst program. Rotational analysts are positioned to place out into a full-time role within the company.

With a suite of more than a dozen products, including TikTok, Helo, and Resso, as well as platforms specific to the China market, including Toutiao, Douyin, and Xigua, ByteDance has made it easier and more fun for people to connect with, consume, and create content.In line with the globalization strategy and vision of the company, the Global Payments team builds a platform to provide cross-border payment solutions for all ByteDance's products and services, that are growing rapidly worldwide.ResponsibilitiesResponsible for establishment and operation of key management metrics dashboardTake ownership of problem solving to push projects on and ensure delivery on scheduleSupport the PMO team in various initiatives and ad hoc projects as requiredQualificationsQualificationsFinal year student of any discipline from a reputable universityStrong analytical skills, be able to think logically and independently.Strong ability in using IT for professional use and can handle somewhat technical queries.Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to manage both internal and external stakeholdersAbility to multitask, prioritize, and control time effectively; is willing to work in a high-paced environment where you may need to shift priorities quickly.A strong collaborator who is comfortable working with colleagues across different teams and cultures. job_title: Barclays Singapore - Banking Analyst - Expert Summer Intern Programme - 2023
qualification: Not Specified
description: About UsBarclays is a British universal bank. We are diversified by business, by different types of customers and clients, and by geography. Our businesses include consumer banking and payments operations around the world, as well as a top-tier, full service, global corporate and investment bank, all of which are supported by our service company which provides technology, operations and functional services across the Group.Join the world of bankingEvery day, corporations worldwide come to Barclays for our banking expertise. We help drive global commerce by providing comprehensive financial, advisory and capital-raising services. Our bankers advise on everything from privatizations and mergers and acquisitions to debt and equity financings and restructuring. Want in? Apply to become a Summer Analyst.The chance to make an impactAs a Summer Analyst, you?€?ll learn the summer learning the art and science behind executing a transaction. As a member of one of our industry, product or geographic groups, you?€?ll work on live deals and deal proposals. You may also work on projects that include:financial analysis and modelingvaluationindustry researchclient due diligencedeveloping written materials, including offering memoranda and new business presentations.A place where you can thriveAt Barclays, you?€?ll be surrounded by people who will help you achieve your ambitions. Our collaborative, supportive environment gives you the chance to build solid relationships with senior leaders and peers alike. During the programme, you?€?ll also:participate in formal and informal trainingconnect with junior and senior mentorsattend dedicated networking sessions and other programme eventsreceive detailed performance feedbackgive back to the community through volunteer events.And if you really impress us, this could be the beginning of an incredible career. We invite top-performing, eligible Summer Analysts to join us as full-time Banking Analysts after graduation.To be considered for this programme, you must:Be an undergraduate student with an anticipated graduation date between December 2023 - June 2024. This is a future position to start in July 2023.Ideally, you would also have:a GPA of 3.2 or abovea strong interest in business and finance, though no specific major is requiredcourse experience in accounting (strongly recommended)resourcefulness, team-orientation, enthusiasm and an entrepreneurial spirit, demonstrated through participation in extracurricular activities.Ready to apply?Visit *************** to learn more about our opportunities and apply.It is the policy of Barclays to ensure equal employment opportunity without discrimination or harassment on the basis of race, color, creed, religion, national origin, alienage or citizenship status, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, marital or domestic/civil partnership status, disability, protected veteran status, genetic information, or any other basis protected by law.-

qualification: Higher Secondary/Pre-U/'A' Level, Professional Certificate/NiTEC, Diploma, Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma
description: Wealth Management Associate ProgramBuild long-term client relationshipsFor more than 200 years, we have been working with innovators, entrepreneurs, industry leaders and their families to help them achieve their unique ambitions, secure their legacies and make a difference in the world. That means providing meaningful, tailored advice now and across generations. The Private Bank helps clients plan, invest, borrow and bank to create the life and legacy they envision.What You'll DoIn this internship program, you will focus on business generation and client engagement. You'll gain exposure to every facet of wealth management, including investments, lending, banking, and trust and estate planning.The course of the internship will run over nine weeks in the North America and eight weeks in Asia Pacific locations.Who We're Looking ForValued qualitiesWe're looking for highly motivated individuals who are energetic and entrepreneurial with a desire to build a business. You should be a self starter who thrives and excels in a competitive industry. You'll also have good judgment, discretion working with confidential information and integrity.Key skillsYou'll need to have excellent communication and presentation skills, strong quantitative skills, a passion for investing, exceptional organizational skills and the ability to multitask. We're looking for those who focus on the client experience and will work tirelessly on the client's behalf.What We OfferOn-the-job experiencePrivate banking is a relationship and by understanding our clients and their finances, we are able to deliver highly customized and comprehensive solutions in order to help them achieve their goals. Throughout the program, you will work with a team of advisors and specialists to bring in new clients and to serve existing customers.TrainingThe program begins with a five-day orientation that introduces you to the firm and our Wealth Management business. It also includes skills development sessions in markets, sales and client management.Career ProgressionThe Summer Associate program prepares you for your next career step, and interns who successfully complete the program may receive an offer of full-time employment.

description: ResponsibilitiesTikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.We are now looking for talented individuals to join us for an internship in 2022 - people who want to inspire creativity and co-create the future with TikTok.Successful candidates must be able to commit to one of the following internship cycles below: -Summer Internship - 09 May 2022 to 29 July 2022 (12 weeks)Off-cycle Internship - 01 August 2022 to 16 December 2022 (20 weeks)We will prioritize candidates who are able to commit to the two above internship periods.Please state your availability clearly in the comments section (Start date, End date).Candidates can apply to a maximum of two positions and will be considered for jobs in the order you apply. The application limit is firm and includes all TikTok/ByteDance jobs globally. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis and we encourage you to apply early.About the Trust & Safety team:Our Trust & Safety team's commitment is to keep our online community safe. We have invested heavily in human and machine-based moderation to remove harmful content quickly and often before it reaches our general community.As part of the Learning & Development team, you will support the design, implementation and analysis of our training development programs to upskill and grow people. These programs will focus on various pillars of training such as leadership, technical skills, and soft skills for global levelResponsibilities:Undertakes creative and design tasks in programs per team's request;Responsible for designs of advertisements/posters, banners, fonts, logos, etc.;Assists with designs for advertisement creatives, including simple video editing, ensures the good presentation and effect of the videos;Participates in designing and making visuals in training and learning content, e.g. PPT, ensures good visual experiences and user experiences;Participates in planning, preparing, and executing training and learning activities;QualificationsPreferably third-year undergraduates, first or second-year graduates;Has a good foundation of painting, masters Photoshop, Flash, Illustrator, and other required design software, keen on design works;Possesses fundamental video editing skills, able to design and complete videos. Understand the basic use of Premiere, AE, EDUIS, and other aftereffect software.Creative, proactive, responsible, and good communicator in a team setting environmentBy submitting an application for this role, you accept and agree to our global applicant privacy policy, which may be accessed here: https://careers.tiktok.com/legal/privacy.

We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

description: About UsOur organisation has a good track record in structuring and managing numerous real estate investments. Our expert management team has high execution capability and in-depth knowledge of the real estate industry provides Integrated Solutions across the real estate value chain.SLP is an established agency with over 20 years track record. It is also twice winner of the Enterprise 50 award in both 2008 & 2013. Our agency is especially recognised in the industrial real estate.In the course of the last 21 years, we are the No1 agency with industrial properties and the preferred choice agency for the SMEs in securing their business space.For this reason, SLP is the only homegrown agency appointed to market a portfolio of JTC's high-spec purposed built projects. Join us as being part of the brand name that is being highly associated with the industrial sector.Job ResponsibilitiesProvision of support to the team in management of all Private Equity (PE) Investment projects including and not limited to:i. Tracking of capital repayments and dividend paymentsii. Cashflow projectionsiii. Maintenance of files documenting the individual PE Investment projectsiv. Repayment letters and dividend payment letters, whenever necessarySupport the establishment and structuring of new private equity funds including but not limited to preparation of fund documents and marketing materialsAssist in liaising with the Project Management and Finance teams on project and cash flow updatesPreparation of monthly Client Statements which consist of the performance summary of clients?€? investment accounts, ZACD Project Summary and periodic market overview reports;Provide support and assistance on ad-hoc duties or whenever necessaryJob RequirementsUndergraduates or poly graduates seeking a fulfilling internship experienceSelf-starter mindset and competent analytical skills with an eye for detailsAble to work in fast-paced environmentFamiliarity in the Real Estate Industry will be an advantageFluent in English and able to communicate effectivelyGood interpersonal skillsAble to commit for at least 3 monthsWhy Join Us?Serving the industrial clients allow you to tap on the hidden gem of the real estate sales sector. You will be able to build on your network with Small and Medium Enterprises (SMEs) business leaders/ owners who are quick in their decision-making for business expansion plans.Over time, you will establish your portfolio in your career with the network of business leaders who are decisive and seeking for industrial and other types of properties on a regular basis.We have a proven sales support and lead generation system that enables you to succeed whether you are new in this industry or looking to have a breakthrough in your career.-

qualification: Not Specified
description: Company DescriptionRobert Bosch (South East Asia) Pte Ltd is a regional subsidiary of the Bosch Group, representing the Group's interests in Southeast Asia where it is present in all ASEAN member countries. Business operations in these countries report to Robert Bosch (South East Asia) Pte Ltd, located in Singapore. Bosch has been present in Southeast Asia since 1919, with diversified businesses in the company's four business sectors - Mobility Solutions, Industrial Technology, Consumer Goods, and Energy and Building Technology. Bosch's strategic objective is to improve quality of life with products and services that are innovative and spark enthusiasm. In short, Bosch creates technology that is ?€?Invented for life.?€?At Bosch, we care. For you, our business, and our environment.Let?€?s turn visions into reality. At Bosch,we shape the future by inventing high-quality technologies and services that spark enthusiasm and enrich people?€?s lives. Our areas of activity are every bit as diverse as our outstanding Bosch teams around the world. Their creativity is the key to innovation through connected living, mobility or industry. Our responsibility goes far beyond business. We?€?re independent of stock markets and bound to the purpose of the Robert Bosch Foundation; our success directly benefits society, the environment, and future generations. Our promise to our associates is rock-solid: we grow together, we enjoy our work, and we inspire each other. Join in and feel the difference.Let?€?s be remarkable.Job DescriptionAs a robot engineer/researcher, the candidate will work on developing a new testbed towards automation in waste sorting and autonomous disassembly process in e-waste management. The candidate will assist inDevelopment of the testbed to integrate sensors, robots, conveyor belts, workbench, controllers, etc.Programing and integrating industrial robots to perform tasks such as pick-n-drop and execution of disassembly action.Development and maintenance of prototype applications based on controllers such as Raspberry Pi and ArduinoImproving trajectory planning algorithms to ensure high throughput of operations such as pick-n-dropDeveloping automated robot trajectory planning for robotic 3D scanning and disassembly, and automated generation and execution of disassembly actions.Closely communicate with other teams via emails and presentation slidesQualificationsAble to work full time for a period of 6 months (September onwards)Undergraduate/graduate studies in related field of robot engineeringMajor in robotics from Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering or Electrical engineering and Computer ScienceExperience with ROS platform and Machine visionAdvanced knowledge in embedded programming, python, machine learning.Independent learning and self-motivated-

Willing to share ideas freely to improve collaboration.Prior knowledge of the payment or financial services industry would be a plus.

description: ResponsibilitiesThe e-commerce industry has seen tremendous growth in recent years and has become a hotly contested space amongst leading Internet companies. With millions of loyal users globally, we believe TikTok is an ideal platform to deliver a brand-new e-commerce experience to customers!Join us as we drive the future of e-commerce here at TikTok! In this role you will understand the industry, analyze the competitive environment, and establish the operation mechanism for thousands of brands, sellers and merchandise across all categories.Together, we can build an innovative, secure and intuitive e-commerce ecosystem that empowers the next-generation user journey in entertainment and shopping!Responsibilities:Research market opportunities and develop go-to-market, seller-growth and merchandise strategies to meet evolving business needsCollaborate with cross-functional teams to drive end-to-end implementations of ad-hoc projectsCoordinate business growth through product optimization, merchant governance and data analysis (content trends, customer behaviors, competitive position...etc.)QualificationsMinimum Bachelor's degree or aboveDeep understanding of the e-commerce industry's business structure, consumer needs, influencers, social media, livestreaming, and digital trends landscapeStrong analytic, logical and problem-solving skills with good attention to detailGood communication and interpersonal skills with project management experienceAdaptable, fast learner, result-oriented and versatile playerProficiency in English and Chinese are compulsoryTikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

description: Our Company:Founded in 2015, GaiGai is one of the largest and fastest-growing offline dating agencies in Singapore. With an extensive database of quality clientele, experienced dating practitioners, modern matching technology and a dedicated events team, GaiGai aims to create meaningful connections for singles from all walks of life. GaiGai also has presence in Taiwan (Paktor Premium), Hong Kong (HeyDouble), Malaysia (Datesmith).Fleek, the sister brand of GaiGai, is a personal development hub committed to helping individuals with their dating, professional, social skills, and image. Fleek works closely with a team of established coaches and lifestyle brands to put one?€?s better self forward through skills building and styling. From one-on-one coaching sessions to engaging workshops, Fleek provides a menu of services essential to growing a personal brand.This role is a long-term/permanent internship program. If you?€?d like to join a young dynamic team and squeeze your creative juices, you are going to fit in perfectly.Responsibilities and DutiesOversee Day-to-Day Social Media Channels - includes content creation, reaching out for brand collaborations, driving growth and engagementSocial Media Analytics - Keep track of delivery, KPIs, analytics and timeline.Creation of Marketing Posters, TikTok videos, Reels any media related visualsManaging a Monthly Newsletter - Article copywriting and general announcementsManaging and Updating the Company?€?s Website and Landing PagesTaking Photos and Videos at Various Fleek Events and WorkshopsCreate an Authentic, Appealing, and Sustainable Brand Strategy to Drive InterestRequired SkillsDiploma in Mass Communications, Marketing, Journalism, Fashion, Fashion MarketingExperienced in Social Media - Those savvy with all trending social media platforms (TikTok, Instagram, etc) are welcome to applyExperienced in Canva - Creation of most social media posts and marketing posters will be done on CanvaProactive and Takes Initiative - In pitching ideas and executing content creationArrange filming times with various Fleek coachesBe comfortable filming yourself to churn out even more contentOutstanding Interpersonal and Communication SkillsAble to work in a team and take part in active discussionsGrowth Mindset and Good Learning Attitude - Willing to learn independently and improve on the job, as well as a general interest in understanding Fleek?€?s workshop/coaching content in order to align social media contentPhotography Skills - Take quality photos of coaches and clients with a phoneVideo Editing Skills - For editing Instagram reels and longer-form videos. YouTube video editing is a plus.Copywriting Skills - Writing articles to generate interest, and general copywriting for social media and marketing content.More You Should Know:5 days work week, with the ability to plan your off day and rest day.Required to work on certain weekends and required to travel to meet clients.Working hours: 10:00am - 7:00pmMinimum commitment period: 6 Months-

job_title: Talent Acquisition Intern - Global Product - Singapore
qualification: Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree, Master's Degree
description: TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.Why Join UsAt TikTok, our people are humble, intelligent, compassionate and creative. We create to inspire - for you, for us, and for more than 1 billion users on our platform. We lead with curiosity and aim for the highest, never shying away from taking calculated risks and embracing ambiguity as it comes. Here, the opportunities are limitless for those who dare to pursue bold ideas that exist just beyond the boundary of possibility. Join us and make impact happen with a career at TikTok.As we work toward our goals, we are looking for enthusiastic undergraduate students to join our growing team as a Talent Acquisition Intern. Here's an opportunity for you to work on a high-growth startup and learn about every aspect of its business. You will have the opportunity to work with the best and the brightest to continually grow this exciting company.You will be involved in the following activities:Participate in all phases of the Talent Acquisition process: gather position requirements from hiring managers and TA Partners, promote open positions via job portals, conduct screening, recruitment, assessment, candidate relationship management, and onboarding process.Source, target and build pipelines of candidates' databases.Professional partnering with the TA Partners , hiring managers and team leaders on hiring needs.Support new project (s), and/or optimize current processes to improve efficiency and effectiveness.Achieve a holistic business understanding through collaborating with cross-functional and regional teams.Support HRBP in any other general HR-related work and/or projects.QualificationsOpen to students who are currently pursuing their bachelor?€?s degree in Human Resources, Business Administration and related fields.Able to commit minimum 3 months full time, 6 months commitment is preferred.Demonstrate proficiency in verbal as well as written EnglishSelf-starter who has an appetite for new learning(s)Ability to work in a fast-paced environmentTikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too

job_title: Winter internship - Business Advisory (Reporting Advisory and Assurance - ESG)
qualification: Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree
description: Title: Winter internship - Business Advisory (Reporting Advisory and Assurance - ESG)What impact will you make?At Deloitte, we offer a unique and exceptional career experience to inspire and empower talents like you to make an impact that matters for our clients, people and community. Whatever your aspirations, Deloitte offers you a highly inclusive, collaborative workplace and unrivalled opportunities to realize your full potential. We are always looking for people with the relentless energy to push themselves further, and to find new avenues and unique ways to reach our shared goals.So what are you waiting for? Join the winning team now.Work you?€?ll doDeloitte's Assurance and Advisory provide audit, accounting and regulatory advice, attest and attest-related services. Using robust audit tools, resources and methodology, our professionals work closely with clients to deliver high-quality services and solutions. We also advise clients in areas such as initial public offerings, internal controls, Singapore and International Financial Reporting Standards, US GAAP and regulatory compliance.To support our growing climate & sustainability/ESG advisory and assurance business across the region, you will work with seniors, managers and directors to deliver a range of deliverables for related engagements.You will assist the ESG Reporting Advisory and Assurance team in the following:Assist in the delivery of the overall Climate & Sustainability/ ESG assurance/advisory engagements using prescribed methodologies and toolkits available;Assist in assurance engagements in line with the assurance standards ISAE 3000 and ISAE 3410 or equivalent;??implement recommendations related to sustainability/ESG program policies and procedures, processes, internal controls, roles and responsibilities, reporting, and identifying information technology solutions; and/ orAssist to perform research for various climate & sustainability/ESG assurance issues using appropriate computer applications in business to gather, to analyse and to present information including databases, networks, and intranets (includes PowerPoint, Factiva, industry-related databases).Your role as a leaderAt Deloitte, we believe in the importance of empowering our people to be leaders at all levels. We expect our people to embrace and live our purpose and shared values, challenging themselves everyday to identify issues that are most important to our clients, our people and the communities, and to make an impact that matters. In addition to living our purpose, Associates / Analysts / Consultants across our Firm are expected to:Understand the expectations set and demonstrates personal accountability for keeping own performance on track.Understand how our daily work contributes to the priorities of the team and the business.Demonstrate strong commitment to personal learning and development.Actively focus on developing effective communication and relationship-building skills, with stakeholders, clients and team.Work effectively in diverse teams within a highly inclusive team culture where everyone is supported, respected and recognized for their contribution.RequirementsWe are looking for undergraduates with an inquisitive mind with a strong passion for sustainability and ESG issues. The candidate should also demonstrate strong writing skills and an ability to translate recommendations and other ideas effectively and concisely in reports, presentation materials, client proposals and other written communication.Due to volume of applications, we regret only shortlisted candidates will be notified. Candidates will only be contacted by authorized Deloitte Recruiters via firm?€?s business contact number or business email address.

job_title: Barclays Singapore - Internal Audit Analyst - Explorer Summer Intern Programme - 2023
qualification: Not Specified
description: About UsBarclays is a British universal bank. We are diversified by business, by different types of customers and clients, and by geography. Our businesses include consumer banking and payments operations around the world, as well as a top-tier, full service, global corporate and investment bank, all of which are supported by our service company which provides technology, operations and functional services across the Group.The team that protects our businessAt Barclays, our reputation means everything. Internal Audit assists the Board and Executive Management to protect the assets, reputation and sustainability of Barclays. Barclays Internal Audit (BIA) aims to provide independent, reliable, valued, insightful and timely assurance to the Board and Executive Management over the effectiveness of governance, risk management and control over current and evolving risks, in the context of the current and expected business environment and in accordance with the International Standards definition of internal auditing. Sound like the place for you? Join us as an analyst to find out.Real responsibility, right awayAs a Summer Analyst, you?€?ll spend the summer with one of our business-facing or functional teams, building a solid foundation in Internal Audit through hands-on experience and exposure to experienced colleagues and senior managers. During the program, you may participate in the following process and performance responsibilities:Process responsibilities:support the team with projects, research and other aspects of their roleplay a part in the audit delivery process through work delegated by audit teamconsistently follow policy and procedure taking into account Barclays reputation at all timesPerformance responsibilities:take ownership of your learning and role performance to get the most out of the internshipproactively take on additional taskssuggest practical ways of improving the work and apply where appropriate.A place where you can thriveAt Barclays, you?€?ll be surrounded by people who will help you achieve your ambitions. Our collaborative, supportive environment gives you the chance to build solid relationships with senior leaders and peers alike. During the programme, you?€?ll also:participate in formal and informal trainingconnect with junior and senior mentorsattend dedicated networking sessions and other programme eventsreceive detailed performance feedbackgive back to the community through volunteer events.And if you really impress us, this could be the beginning of an incredible career. We invite top-performing, eligible summer analysts to join us as full-time Internal Audit analysts after graduation.To be considered for this programme, you must:be an undergraduate student with an anticipated graduation date between December 2023 - June 2024.Ideally, you would also have:a GPA of 3.2 or aboveunrestricted respective locations work authorizationresourcefulness, leadership, team-orientation, enthusiasm and an entrepreneurial spirit, demonstrated through participation in extracurricular activities.Ready to apply?Visit *************** to learn more about our opportunities and apply.It is the policy of Barclays to ensure equal employment opportunity without discrimination or harassment on the basis of race, color, creed, religion, national origin, alienage or citizenship status, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, marital or domestic/civil partnership status, disability, protected veteran status, genetic information, or any other basis protected by law.-

description: ResponsibilitiesFounded in 2012, ByteDance's mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. With a suite of more than a dozen products, including TikTok, Helo, and Resso, as well as platforms specific to the China market, including Toutiao, Douyin, and Xigua, ByteDance has made it easier and more fun for people to connect with, consume, and create content.Successful candidates must be able to commit to one of the following internship cycles below: -Summer Internship - 09 May 2022 to 29 July 2022 (12 weeks)Off-cycle Internship - 01 August 2022 to 16 December 2022 (20 weeks)We will prioritize candidates who are able to commit to the two above internship periods.Please state your availability clearly in the comments section (Start date, End date).Candidates can apply to a maximum of two positions and will be considered for jobs in the order you apply. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis and we encourage you to apply early.About the teamIn line with the globalization strategy and vision of the company, the Global Payments team builds a platform to provide cross-border payment solutions for all ByteDance's products and services, that are growing rapidly worldwide.ResponsibilitiesAssist in performing investigations and analysis of cardholder disputed transactions via Visa, Mastercard, AMEX, JCB, etc.;Understand chargeback dispute process and support response to the banks;Understand fraud indicators in online payment and can perform fraud alert analysis;Support the risk team in various initiatives and ad hoc projects as required.QualificationsFinal year student of any discipline from a reputable university;Strong analytical skills, be able to think logically and independently;Strong ability in using IT for professional use and can handle somewhat technical queries;Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to manage both internal and external stakeholders;Ability to multitask, prioritize, and control time effectively; is willing to work in a high-paced environment where you may need to shift priorities quickly;A strong collaborator who is comfortable working with colleagues across different teams and cultures. Willing to share ideas freely to improve collaboration;Prior knowledge of the payment or financial services industry would be a plus.By submitting an application for this role, you accept and agree to our global applicant privacy policy, which may be accessed here: https://jobs.bytedance.com/en/legal/privacy.
